h4.p: [03] 1^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^T3.0001^ea^ ^a^M3.0001^ea^ ^a^V3.0001^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho, adosa.m pa.ticca alobho amoho, amoha.m pa.ticca alobho adoso, lobha.m pa.ticca ^a^V3.0002^ea^ moho, moha.m pa.ticca lobho, dosa.m pa.ticca moho, moha.m pa.ticca doso; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m (cakka.m). lobha.m pa.ticca moho sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^M3.0002^ea^ dhamma.m ^a^T3.0002^ea^ pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nahetuu khandhe pa.ticca hetuu; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu.m pa.ticca hetuu. (2)

[03] nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa hetu ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe pa.ticca dve khandhaa hetu ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca hetuu sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa. (3)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ hetu~nca nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- alobha~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca adoso amoho (cakka.m). lobha~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca moho, dosa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca moho...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... alobha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca adoso amoho...pe0.... (1)

[03] hetu~nca ^a^V3.0003^ea^ nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m eka.m khandha~nca hetu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca hetu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu~nca hetu~nca pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa. (2)

[03] hetu~nca nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti ^a^T3.0003^ea^ hetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m eka.m khandha~nca alobha~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa adoso amoho ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca alobha~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa adoso amoho ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m (cakka.m). nahetu.m eka.m khandha~nca lobha~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa moho ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu~nca alobha~nca pa.ticca adoso amoho sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa. (3)

[03] 4^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^M3.0003^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa (ruupa.m cha.d.detvaa aruupeyeva nava pa~nhaa)... adhipatipaccayaa (pa.tisandhi natthi, paripu.n.na.m) eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m... (ima.m naana.m) anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa (sabbe mahaabhuutaa yaava asa~n~nasattaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... nissayapaccayaa... upanissayapaccayaa... purejaatapaccayaa... aasevanapaccayaa (dviisupi pa.tisandhi natthi)... kammapaccayaa... vipaakapaccayaa (sa.mkhitta.m)... avigatapaccayaa.
[03] 5^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^V3.0004^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m nahetu.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ^a^T3.0004^ea^ ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0....(1)
[03] nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (2)
[03] 7^b^.^eb^ hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- hetu.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] nahetu.m ^a^M3.0004^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- nahetuu khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... sabbe mahaabhuutaa...pe0.... (1)

[03] hetu~nca nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- hetu~nca nahetu~nca khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... naadhipatipaccayaa... (paripu.n.na.m) naanantarapaccayaa... nasamanantarapaccayaa... naa~n~nama~n~napaccayaa... naupanissayapaccayaa.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ hetu.m ^a^V3.0005^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho (cakka.m). lobha.m pa.ticca moho, moha.m pa.ticca lobho; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe hetu.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa, hetu.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^T3.0005^ea^ ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe alobha.m pa.ticca adoso amoho sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (cakka.m). lobha.m pa.ticca moho sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe nahetu.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... nahetuu khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe nahetuu khandhe pa.ticca hetuu; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe nahetu.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa hetu ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ hetu~nca nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe alobha~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca adoso amoho ^a^M3.0005^ea^ (cakka.m). aruupe lobha~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca moho (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[01] hetu~nca ^a^V3.0006^ea^ nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe nahetu.m eka.m khandha~nca hetu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... nahetuu khandhe ca hetu~nca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, hetu~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ^a^T3.0006^ea^; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[01] hetu~nca nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa uppajjanti napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe nahetu.m eka.m khandha~nca alobha~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa adoso amoho ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (cakka.m). nahetu.m eka.m khandha~nca lobha~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa moho ca (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati napacchaajaatapaccayaa... naaasevanapaccayaa.
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- hetu.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa cetanaa. (1)
[01] nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- nahetuu khandhe pa.ticca sampayuttakaa cetanaa... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m...pe0.... (1)
[01] hetu~nca nahetu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca sampayuttakaa cetanaa. (1)
[01] hetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca hetu dhammo uppajjati navipaakapaccayaa... nava.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu dhammo uppajjati naaahaarapaccayaa -- baahira.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... naindriyapaccayaa ^a^T3.0007^ea^ -- baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^M3.0006^ea^... utusamu.t.thaana.m...pe0... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuute pa.ticca ruupajiivitindriya.m, najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^V3.0007^ea^ ...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... namaggapaccayaa -- ahetuka.m nahetu.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... nasampayuttapaccayaa... navippayuttapaccayaa... (napurejaatasadisa.m, aruupapa~nhaayeva) nonatthipaccayaa... novigatapaccayaa.

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa dve, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni...pe0... naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte ^a^T3.0008^ea^ nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0007^ea^ ^a^V3.0008^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, anantare dve...pe0... kamme dve, vipaake eka.m, aahaare dve, indriye dve, jhaane dve, magge eka.m, sampayutte dve...pe0... avigate dve.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.

[03] (sahajaatavaaropi paccayavaaropi nissayavaaropi pa.ticcavaarasadisaayeva pa~nhaa. mahaabhuutesu ni.t.thitesu ``vatthu.m paccayaa''ti kaatabbaa. pa~ncaayatanaani anulomepi paccaniiyepi yathaa labbhanti tathaa kaatabbaa. sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi paripu.n.no. ruupa.m natthi, aruupameva.)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). lobho mohassa hetupaccayena paccayo, doso mohassa hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] hetu ^a^V3.0009^ea^ dhammo nahetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0009^ea^ -- alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). lobho mohassa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^M3.0008^ea^ dhammo hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha hetuu uppajjanti. (1)
[03] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha nahetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati. jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m...pe0... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa nahetuu pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m, nahetuu khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena nahetucittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m {aakaasaana~ncaayatanakiriya.m (syaa0) evamuparipi tiisu .thaanesu} vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m ^a^T3.0010^ea^ nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0010^ea^ ...pe0... nahetuu khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa (pa.thamagamana.myeva, aavajjanaa natthi. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassaati ida.m natthi). (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, ta.m ^a^M3.0009^ea^ aarabbha hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti (tattha tattha .thitena ima.m kaatabba.m dutiyagamanasadisa.m). (3)
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha hetuu uppajjanti. (1)
[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha nahetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m katvaa hetuu ^a^T3.0011^ea^ uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m hetuuna.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati ^a^V3.0011^ea^. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m katvaa nahetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m katvaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa (vitthaaretabba.m yaava. nahetuu khandhaa). ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nahetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ^a^M3.0010^ea^ dhammo hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa (sa.mkhitta.m. yaava vatthu nahetuu ca khandhaa taava kaatabba.m). ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ nahetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m hetuuna.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati ^a^T3.0012^ea^. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ta.m garu.m katvaa nahetuu khandhaa ca hetuu ca uppajjanti, pubbe suci.n.naani (yaava vatthu nahetuu khandhaa, ca taava kaatabba.m). ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nahetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 23^b^.^eb^ hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa hetuu uppajjanti. (1)

[03] hetu ^a^V3.0012^ea^ ca nahetu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa nahetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
[03] 24^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M3.0011^ea^ dhammo ^a^T3.0013^ea^ nahetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nahetuu khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa (sa.mkhitta.m) nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0.... (2)
[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo (nahetumuulaka.m tii.nipi ekasadisa.m). (3)

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ^a^V3.0013^ea^ hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m.)... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (ime dvepi pa.ticcasadisaa. nissayapaccayo paccayavaare nissayapaccayasadiso.)

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo ^a^T3.0014^ea^, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- hetuu hetuuna.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- hetuu nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ^a^M3.0012^ea^ dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo ^a^V3.0014^ea^, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- hetuu hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti...pe0... di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo ^a^T3.0015^ea^, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0... pakatuupanissayo (dutiyaupanissayasadisa.m). (3)

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa hetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa hetuuna.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo ^a^M3.0013^ea^ ...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo ^a^V3.0015^ea^ -- hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa hetuuna~nca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... ^a^T3.0016^ea^ vatthu nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu hetuuna.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 32^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa hetuu purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa nahetuu khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] hetu ^a^M3.0014^ea^ ^a^V3.0016^ea^ dhammo hetussa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo (anantarasadisa.m) ^a^T3.0017^ea^.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nahetu cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nahetu cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nahetu cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m hetuuna.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nahetu cetanaa vipaakaana.m hetuuna.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nahetu cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nahetu cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako alobho adosassa amohassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m. vipaakavibha"nge nava pa~nhaa).

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetuu aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa kaayassa ^a^T3.0018^ea^ aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nahetu ^a^V3.0017^ea^ dhammo hetussa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetuu aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m hetuuna.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] nahetu ^a^M3.0015^ea^ dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetuu aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo...pe0... (hetumuulake tii.ni).

[03] nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- nahetuu indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo (eva.m indriyapaccayaa vitthaaretabbaa. nava).
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ nahetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo. (imesu dviisu nava.)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne hetuu ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. hetuu vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0019^ea^. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ^a^V3.0018^ea^ dhammo nahetussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nahetuu khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne nahetuu khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. khandhaa vatthussa...pe0... vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, vatthu nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^M3.0016^ea^. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nahetuu khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu hetuuna.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu hetuuna.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] hetuu ca nahetuu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne hetuu ^a^T3.0020^ea^ ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). lobho mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[01] hetu dhammo nahetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ ^a^V3.0019^ea^ -- hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). lobho mohassa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M3.0017^ea^ dhammo nahetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne nahetu eko khandho ^a^T3.0021^ea^ ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa atthipaccayena paccayo; vatthu khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, vatthu nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nahetuu khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[01] nahetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nahetuu khandhaa sampayuttakaana.m hetuuna.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu hetuuna.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati; vatthu hetuuna.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu dhammo hetussa ca nahetussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m hetuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m ^a^T3.0022^ea^ atthipaccayena ^a^V3.0020^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati; vatthu hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa hetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. sahajaato^eb^ -- alobho ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m) ^a^M3.0018^ea^. lobho ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... alobho ca vatthu ca adosassa amohassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). (1)

[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa nahetussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ca hetuu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne hetuu ca vatthu ca nahetuuna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa ^b^atthipaccayena^eb^ paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- hetuu ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ca nahetu ca dhammaa hetussa ^a^T3.0023^ea^ ca nahetussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. sahajaato^eb^ -- nahetu eko khandho ca alobho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m adosassa amohassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). nahetu eko khandho ca lobho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m mohassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m); pa.tisandhikkha.ne nahetu eko khandho ca alobho ca (cakka.m). pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... alobho ca vatthu ca adosassa amohassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo, lobho ca vatthu ca mohassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo....
[03] natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V3.0021^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake nava, aahaare tii.ni, indriye nava, jhaane tii.ni, magge ^a^M3.0019^ea^ nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava (eva.m anumajjantena ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 43^b^.^eb^ hetu dhammo hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena ^a^T3.0024^ea^ paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare ^a^V3.0023^ea^ tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni...pe0... namagge tii.ni, nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte tii.ni, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] sahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako sahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] ahetuko ^a^M3.0048^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako ahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vipaakapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0049^ea^ dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetukaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^T3.0059^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ahetukaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne ahetukaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^V3.0058^ea^ paccayo; vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu ahetukaana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ahetukaa khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu vicikicchaasahagataana.m uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa ahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ^a^T3.0060^ea^ ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ^a^M3.0050^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] sahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa mohassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko ^a^V3.0059^ea^ dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetuko...pe0.... (3)

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ahetuko dhammo ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- ahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa kaatabba.m). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ^a^T3.0061^ea^ aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo; vatthu ahetukaana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ahetukaa khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ ^a^M3.0051^ea^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, vatthu sahetukaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ahetuko dhammo sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^V3.0060^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aarabbha vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ^a^T3.0062^ea^ ca moho ca uppajjanti, vatthu vicikicchaasahagataana.m uddhaccasahagataana.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 118^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... [03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa ahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne sahetukaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena ^a^M3.0052^ea^ paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca vatthu ca mohassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagataa uddhaccasahagataa khandhaa ca moho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa ^a^T3.0063^ea^ khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko ca ahetuko ca dhammaa sahetukassa ca ahetukassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca moho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m mohassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... (3)

[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ hetu ^a^V3.0069^ea^ ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- alobho adosassa amohassa hetupaccayena paccayo (yathaa pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m). (1)
[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha hetuu uppajjanti. (1)
[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu.m aarabbha sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati. jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti. pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti. sahetuke ceva na ca hetuu khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. cetopariya~naa.nena sahetukaa ceva na ca hetucittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati; aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa ^a^T3.0071^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa... (yathaa pa.thamagamana.m eva.m ninnaana.m). (2)

[03] sahetuko ^a^M3.0060^ea^ ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa... (yathaa pa.thamagamana.m eva.m ninnaana.m). (3)

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha hetuu uppajjanti. (1)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] 139^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m katvaa hetuu uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m hetuuna.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m katvaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena ^a^T3.0072^ea^ paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu.m garu.m katvaa ^a^M3.0061^ea^ hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- hetu ceva sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna~nca adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] 140^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, sahetuke ceva na ca hetuu khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi ^a^V3.0072^ea^ uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (pa.thamagamana.myeva). ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sahetuko ceva na ^a^T3.0073^ea^ ca hetu adhipati sampayuttakaana.m hetuuna.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca sahetuko ceva na ca hetu ca dhammaa hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- hetu~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa hetuu ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena ^a^V3.0073^ea^ paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ^a^T3.0074^ea^ hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sahetukaana~nceva na ca hetuuna.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa hetuu pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m hetuuna.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sahetukaana~nceva na ca hetuuna.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa...pe0... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa, nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] 146^b^.^eb^ hetu ceva sahetuko ca dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- hetuu hetuuna.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa ^a^T3.0076^ea^ upanissayapaccayena ^a^V3.0075^ea^ paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, siila.m...pe0... patthana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo hetussa ceva sahetukassa ca sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna~nca kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- sahetukaa ceva na ca hetuu cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m hetuuna~nca kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] 150^b^.^eb^ sahetuko ceva na ca hetu dhammo sahetukassa ceva na ca hetussa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

(yathaa hetusahetukaduka.m eva.m vitthaaretabba.m, ninnaanaakara.na.m).
[06] hetuhetusampayuttaduka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 159^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^T3.0081^ea^ ^a^M3.0069^ea^ ^a^V3.0081^ea^ sahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] nahetu.m sahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nahetuu sahetuke khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] nahetu.m sahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0082^ea^ ...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] nahetu.m ahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa. (2)

[03] nahetu.m ahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa, mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m sahetuka~nca nahetu.m ahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne nahetu.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha~nca ^a^T3.0082^ea^ vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0.... (1)

[03] nahetu.m sahetuka~nca nahetu.m ahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nahetuu sahetuke khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] nahetu.m ^a^M3.0070^ea^ sahetuka~nca nahetu.m ahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne nahetu.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... nahetuu sahetuke khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m. (3)

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m sahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- nahetu.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[01] nahetu.m ^a^V3.0083^ea^ ahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- nahetu.m ahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)
[01] nahetu.m ahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa. (3)

[01] nahetu.m sahetuka~nca nahetu.m ahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne nahetu.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m. eva.m vibhajitabba.m).

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare ^a^T3.0083^ea^ cattaari, samanantare cattaari, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme nava, vipaake nava, aahaare nava (sa.mkhitta.m. sabbattha nava), sampayutte cattaari, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^M3.0071^ea^ ahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0084^ea^ -- nahetu.m ahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne (yaava asa~n~nasattaa moho natthi). (1)

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m sahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- nahetuu sahetuke khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] nahetu.m ahetuka.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- nahetuu ahetuke khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). (1)

[03] nahetu.m sahetuka~nca nahetu.m ahetuka~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- nahetuu sahetuke khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare ^a^T3.0084^ea^ tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme dve, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0072^ea^ ^a^V3.0085^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme eka.m, navipaake pa~nca, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 168^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m...pe0... aahaare eka.m...pe0... jhaane eka.m, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte eka.m...pe0... vigate eka.m, avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] (sahajaatavaarepi eva.m ga.netabba.m.)
[03] 169^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^V3.0086^ea^ sahetuka.m dhamma.m paccayaa nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni.

[03] nahetu.m ahetuka.m dhamma.m paccayaa nahetu ^a^T3.0085^ea^ ahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- eka.m mahaabhuuta.m paccayaa tayo mahaabhuutaa, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] nahetu.m ^a^M3.0073^ea^ ahetuka.m dhamma.m paccayaa nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (2)

[03] nahetu.m ahetuka.m dhamma.m paccayaa nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0...(3)
[03] nahetu.m sahetuka~nca nahetu.m ahetuka~nca dhamma.m paccayaa nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa (gha.tanaa tii.ni, pavattipa.tisandhi paripu.n.na.m. sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 170^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne cattaari...pe0... a~n~nama~n~ne cha...pe0... purejaate aasevane cattaari...pe0... avigate nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 171^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni...pe0... novigate tii.ni.
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[06] (nissayavaaro paccayavaarasadiso.)
[03] 172^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^V3.0087^ea^ sahetuka.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nahetu sahetuko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m sahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....
[03] 173^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T3.0086^ea^ eka.m, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa eka.m, anantare dve (sabbattha dve), magge eka.m...pe0... avigate dve.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 174^b^.^eb^ nahetu.m ^a^M3.0074^ea^ ahetuka.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho nahetu ahetuko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- nahetu.m ahetuka.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....
[03] 175^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naadhipatiyaa dve, napurejaate dve, napacchaajaate dve, naaasevane dve, nakamme dve, navipaake dve, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte dve.
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[06] (eva.m avasesaapi dve ga.nanaa ga.netabbaa.)
[06] (sampayuttavaaro sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso)

[03] 176^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V3.0088^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati; jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti; pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... nahetuu sahetuke khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena nahetusahetukacittasama"ngissa ^a^T3.0087^ea^ citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...pe0... nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; nahetuu sahetuke khandhe aarabbha nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nahetuu sahetuke khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m ^a^M3.0075^ea^ uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati, nahetuu sahetuke khandhe aarabbha nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] 177^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^V3.0089^ea^ ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe aarabbha nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe aniccato ^a^T3.0088^ea^ ...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena nahetuahetukacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati. nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; nahetuu ahetuke khandhe aarabbha nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m samaadiyitvaa uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nahetuu sahetuke khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nahetusahetukaadhipati ^a^M3.0076^ea^ sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu ^a^V3.0090^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa ca nahetuahetukassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m ^a^T3.0089^ea^ khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... nahetuu ahetuke khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nahetusahetukaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetu sahetuka.m cuticitta.m nahetuahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; nahetu sahetuka.m bhava"nga.m aavajjanaaya, nahetu sahetuka.m bhava"nga.m nahetuahetukassa bhava"ngassa, nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa nahetuahetukassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ^a^M3.0077^ea^ nahetuahetukaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa pa~ncanna.m vi~n~naa.naana.m anantarapaccayena ^a^T3.0090^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- nahetu ahetuka.m cuticitta.m nahetusahetukassa upapatticittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa nahetusahetukaana.m ^a^V3.0091^ea^ khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; nahetuu ahetukaa khandhaa nahetusahetukassa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 180^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo (iha gha.tanaa natthi, satta pa~nhaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (cha pa~nhaa)... nissayapaccayena paccayo (pavattipa.tisandhi satta pa~nhaa, iha gha.tanaa natthi).

[03] 181^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... patthana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddhaa kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; siila.m...pe0... patthanaa kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa ^a^T3.0091^ea^ dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa ^a^M3.0078^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ^a^V3.0092^ea^ ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; kaayika.m sukha.m ...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu ahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena ^a^T3.0092^ea^ paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa... vatthu nahetuahetukaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nahetu ahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, kusalaakusale niruddhe nahetu sahetuko vipaako tadaaramma.nataa uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu nahetusahetukaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 184^b^.^eb^ nahetu ^a^M3.0079^ea^ sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nahetu sahetukaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m nahetusahetukaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] 192^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetuahetukassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nahetuu sahetukaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] 193^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko dhammo nahetusahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- nahetu sahetuko eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 194^b^.^eb^ nahetu sahetuko ca nahetu ahetuko ca dhammaa nahetusahetukassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- nahetu sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... nahetu sahetuko eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0.... [03] 195^b^.^eb^ aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare cattaari, samanantare cattaari, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate dve, pacchaajaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme cattaari, vipaake cattaari, aahaare cattaari, indriye cattaari, jhaane cattaari ^a^V3.0098^ea^, magge tii.ni, sampayutte dve, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate ^a^T3.0098^ea^ cattaari, avigate satta (eva.m ga.netabba.m)

[03] 7^b^.^eb^ sappaccaya.m ^a^M3.0087^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa sappaccayo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sappaccaya.m eka.m ^a^V3.0103^ea^ khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe paccayaa vatthu, vatthu.m paccayaa khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa sappaccayaa khandhaa.

[03] 8^b^.^eb^ sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sappaccayaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa, siila.m samaadiyitvaa, uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m ^a^T3.0102^ea^ paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti; pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... sappaccaye khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^V3.0104^ea^ ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena sappaccayacittasama"ngissa ^a^M3.0088^ea^ citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... sappaccayaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... sappaccaye khandhe garu.m ^a^T3.0103^ea^ katvaa assaadeti abhinandati; ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sappaccayaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 12^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0089^ea^ eka.m, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa dve, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate eka.m, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye eka.m, upanissaye dve, purejaate eka.m (sabbattha eka.m), avigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ sappaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] appaccayo dhammo sappaccayassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T3.0104^ea^ paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0106^ea^ dve, naaaramma.ne eka.m, naadhipatiyaa dve, naanantare dve, nasamanantare dve...pe0... naupanissaye dve, napurejaate dve...pe0... novigate dve, noavigate dve (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne eka.m, naadhipatiyaa eka.m, naanantare eka.m, nasamanantare eka.m, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye eka.m...pe0... nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa eka.m, novigate eka.m (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[06] sa"nkhataduka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ anidassana.m ^a^V3.0108^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa anidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa anidassana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca anidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)

[03] anidassana.m ^a^M3.0091^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- anidassane khandhe pa.ticca sanidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ^a^T3.0106^ea^; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca sanidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (2)

[03] anidassana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa sanidassana~nca anidassana~nca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ^a^V3.0109^ea^ ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca sanidassana~nca anidassana~nca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (3)

[03] anidassana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa uppajjanti adhipatipaccayaa -- anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa sanidassana~nca anidassana~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca sanidassana~nca ^a^T3.0107^ea^ anidassana~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (3) (sa.mkhitta.m, sabbe kaatabbaa.)

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0092^ea^ ^a^V3.0110^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne eka.m, adhipatiyaa tii.ni, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye eka.m, purejaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni (sabbattha tii.ni), magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ anidassana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anidassano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa anidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca anidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] anidassana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sanidassano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuke anidassane khandhe pa.ticca sanidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuute ^a^T3.0108^ea^ pa.ticca ^a^V3.0111^ea^ sanidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m... baahire... aahaarasamu.t.thaane... utusamu.t.thaane... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuute pa.ticca sanidassana.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (2)

[03] anidassana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa uppajjanti nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa sanidassana~nca ^a^M3.0093^ea^ anidassana~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca...pe0... baahire... aahaarasamu.t.thaane... utusamu.t.thaane... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuute pa.ticca sanidassana~nca anidassana~nca ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m. (3) (eva.m sabbe kaatabbaa.)

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa tii.ni, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate tii.ni, napacchaajaate tii.ni, naaasevane tii.ni, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake tii.ni, naaahaare tii.ni, naindriye tii.ni, najhaane tii.ni, namagge tii.ni, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (eva.m ga.netabba.m).

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni (sabbattha tii.ni), nakamme eka.m ^a^V3.0112^ea^, navipaake tii.ni, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^T3.0109^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye eka.m ^a^M3.0094^ea^, purejaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni...pe0... jhaane tii.ni, magge eka.m, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa tii.ni, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate tii.ni.

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ anidassana.m dhamma.m paccayaa anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- anidassana.m ^a^V3.0113^ea^ eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa anidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe paccayaa vatthu, vatthu.m paccayaa khandhaa; eka.m mahaabhuuta.m paccayaa...pe0... mahaabhuute paccayaa anidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa anidassanaa khandhaa (itarepi dve pa~nhaa kaatabbaa).

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ anidassana.m dhamma.m paccayaa anidassano dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa khandhaa, cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa anidassanaa khandhaa (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 28^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne eka.m, adhipatiyaa tii.ni...pe0... avigate ^a^T3.0110^ea^ tii.ni.

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ anidassana.m ^a^M3.0095^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa anidassano dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa anidassana.m cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa anidassanaa khandhaa, vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (itarepi dve kaatabbaa. sa.mkhitta.m).
