[03] 33^b^.^eb^ anidassana.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho anidassano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa ^a^T3.0111^ea^ -- anidassana.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....
[03] anidassana.m ^a^M3.0096^ea^ ^a^V3.0115^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho anidassano dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa (eva.m sabba.m sappaccayaga.nanaahi saddhi.m kaatabba.m).
[06] (sampayuttavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso).

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaa hetuu sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- anidassanaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ sanidassano ^a^V3.0116^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sanidassana.m ruupa.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; sanidassanaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T3.0112^ea^ paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m ^a^M3.0097^ea^ paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m... sadde...pe0... vatthu.m anidassane khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena anidassanacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... anidassanaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sanidassana.m ruupa.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0113^ea^ -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ^a^V3.0117^ea^ ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m anidassane khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anidassanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anidassanaadhipati sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anidassanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M3.0098^ea^ sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa anidassanaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... gotrabhu maggassa...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ anidassano ^a^T3.0114^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... eka.m... nissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 39^b^.^eb^ sanidassano ^a^V3.0118^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- va.n.nasampada.m patthayamaano daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m karoti, va.n.nasampadaa saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya... kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- sanidassana.m ruupa.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^M3.0099^ea^ ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m ^a^T3.0115^ea^ uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena ^a^V3.0119^ea^ paccayo; ruupaayatana~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 41^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa anidassanaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa... gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ anidassano ^a^T3.0116^ea^ ^a^M3.0100^ea^ dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- anidassanaa ^a^V3.0120^ea^ cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ (vitthaaretabba.m). (2)
[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ (vitthaaretabba.m). (3)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (tiisupi kaba.liikaaro aahaaro kaatabbo)... indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (tiisupi ruupajiivitindriya.m)... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa anidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne anidassanaa khandhaa anidassanaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0117^ea^. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^M3.0101^ea^ ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena ^a^V3.0121^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sanidassana.m ruupa.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- anidassano ^a^T3.0118^ea^ eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m. yaava asa~n~nasattaa). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, saddaayatana.m sotavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anidassanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa anidassanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ anidassanaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ^a^V3.0122^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m ^a^M3.0102^ea^ upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... baahiraa... aahaarasamu.t.thaanaa... utusamu.t.thaanaa... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m, upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anidassanaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sanidassanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa sanidassanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ sanidassanaana.m ^a^T3.0119^ea^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- anidassano eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m, ka.tattaaruupaana.m, upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; baahiraa... aahaarasamu.t.thaanaa... utusamu.t.thaanaa... asa~n~nasattaana.m mahaabhuutaa sanidassanaana~nca anidassanaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m upaadaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa anidassanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anidassanaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; ruupaayatana~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo.
[03] natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m ^a^V3.0123^ea^, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye dve, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye ^a^M3.0103^ea^ tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte ^a^T3.0120^ea^ eka.m, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate pa~nca (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ sanidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anidassano dhammo anidassanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] anidassano dhammo sanidassanassa ca anidassanassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[01] sanidassano ca anidassano ca dhammaa anidassanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0124^ea^ pa~nca, naaaramma.ne cattaari, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, naanantare pa~nca, nasamanantare pa~nca, nasahajaate pa~nca, naa~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nanissaye cattaari, naupanissaye pa~nca, napurejaate ^a^T3.0121^ea^ cattaari, napacchaajaate pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), nasampayutte pa~nca, navippayutte cattaari, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa pa~nca, novigate pa~nca, noavigate cattaari.
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0104^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni...pe0... nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 52^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0125^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate tii.ni, a~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, nissaye tii.ni, upanissaye dve, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni...pe0... magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte tii.ni, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate pa~nca.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] sanidassanaduka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 53^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigha.m ^a^T3.0122^ea^ ^a^V3.0126^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa, dve mahaabhuute pa.ticca eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ^a^M3.0105^ea^, sappa.tighe mahaabhuute pa.ticca sappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... rasaayatana.m. (1)

[03] sappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sappa.tighe mahaabhuute pa.ticca aapodhaatu, sappa.tighe mahaabhuute pa.ticca appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m pa.ticca aapodhaatu itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. (2)

[03] sappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho ca appa.tigho ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- sappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa aapodhaatu ca, dve mahaabhuute...pe0... sappa.tighe mahaabhuute pa.ticca sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana.m ^a^V3.0127^ea^ pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... rasaayatana.m aapodhaatu itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. (3)

[03] 54^b^.^eb^ appa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- appa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa ^a^T3.0123^ea^, aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. (1)

[03] appa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- appa.tighe khandhe pa.ticca sappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca sappa.tighaa mahaabhuutaa, aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca sappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m. (2)

[03] appa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho ca appa.tigho ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- appa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m, itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. (3)

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigha~nca ^a^M3.0106^ea^ appa.tigha~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- appa.tighe khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca sappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... sappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta~nca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0... sappa.tighe mahaabhuute ca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca sappa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0.... (1)

[03] sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- appa.tighe khandhe ca mahaabhuute ^a^T3.0124^ea^ ca pa.ticca appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne appa.tighe ^a^V3.0128^ea^ khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca appa.tigha.m ka.tattaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. (2)

[03] sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho ca appa.tigho ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- appa.tighe khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... appa.tighe khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca ka.tattaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca cakkhaayatana.m...pe0... rasaayatana.m, itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro. (3)

[03] 56^b^.^eb^ appa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- appa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa.

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayaa (pa.tisandhi vajjetabbaa, ka.tattaaruupaa ca)... anantarapaccayaa... samanantarapaccayaa... sahajaatapaccayaa (sabbe mahaabhuutaa kaatabbaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa -- sappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa, dve mahaabhuute...pe0.... (1)
[03] sappa.tigha.m ^a^M3.0107^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca ^a^T3.0125^ea^ appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa -- sappa.tighe mahaabhuute pa.ticca aapodhaatu...pe0.... (2)

[03] sappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho ca appa.tigho ca dhammaa uppajjanti a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa ^a^V3.0129^ea^ -- sappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa aapodhaatu ca, dve mahaabhuute...pe0.... (3)

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ appa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa -- appa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa. (1)
[03] appa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa -- aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca sappa.tighaa mahaabhuutaa (ime ajjhattikabaahiraa mahaabhuutaa kaatabbaa). (2)

[03] sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati a~n~nama~n~napaccayaa -- sappa.tigha.m eka.m mahaabhuuta~nca aapodhaatu~nca pa.ticca dve mahaabhuutaa...pe0... nissayapaccayaa...pe0... avigatapaccayaa.

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne eka.m, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye eka.m, purejaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme nava, vipaake nava, aahaare nava, indriye nava, jhaane nava, magge nava, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate nava.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 60^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigha.m ^a^T3.0126^ea^ ^a^M3.0108^ea^ ^a^V3.0130^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa... tii.ni.

[01] appa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m appa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m... aapodhaatu.m pa.ticca appa.tigha.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m; vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)
[01] (appa.tighamuulaka.m itarepi dve pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. gha.tanepi tii.ni pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. ajjhattikaa baahiraa mahaabhuutaa sabbe jaanitvaa kaatabbaa.)
[03] 61^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigha.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa (sabba.m sa.mkhitta.m)... novigatapaccayaa.

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane ^a^V3.0131^ea^ nava, nakamme nava, navipaake nava, naaahaare nava, naindriye nava, najhaane nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte ^a^T3.0127^ea^ nava, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0109^ea^ naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme eka.m, navipaake nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye eka.m, purejaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme nava...pe0... magge eka.m, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate nava.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] (sahajaatavaaropi ^a^V3.0132^ea^ pa.ticcavaarasadiso.)
[03] 65^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigha.m dhamma.m paccayaa sappa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni.

[03] appa.tigha.m ^a^M3.0110^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- appa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^T3.0128^ea^ ...pe0... aapodhaatu.m paccayaa appa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, aapodhaatu.m paccayaa itthindriya.m...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro, vatthu.m paccayaa appa.tighaa khandhaa. (1)
[03] (avasesaa pa~nca pa~nhaa pa.ticcavaarasadisaa.)
[03] 66^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigha.m dhamma.m paccayaa appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m. (1)

[03] appa.tigha.m dhamma.m paccayaa appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- appa.tigha.m eka.m khandha.m ^a^V3.0133^ea^ paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa appa.tighaa khandhaa. (1)

[03] sappa.tigha~nca appa.tigha~nca dhamma.m paccayaa appa.tigho dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca cakkhaayatana~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca kaayaayatana~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... adhipatipaccayaa... (sa.mkhitta.m) avigatapaccayaa.

[03] 67^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne tii.ni, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare tii.ni, samanantare tii.ni, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye tii.ni, purejaate tii.ni, aasevane eka.m, kamme nava...pe0... avigate nava (eva.m paccaniiyaga.nanaapi kaatabbaa).
[06] (nissayavaaropi paccayavaarasadiso.)
[03] (sa.msa.t.thavaarepi sabbattha eka.m, sa.mkhitta.m ^a^T3.0129^ea^. avigatapaccayaa, ekaayeva pa~nhaa. dvepi vaaraa kaatabbaa.)

[03] 68^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho ^a^M3.0111^ea^ ^a^V3.0134^ea^ dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- appa.tighaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] appa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- appa.tighaa hetuu sappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa ca appa.tighassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- appa.tighaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m sappa.tighaana~nca appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 69^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... sappa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m ^a^T3.0130^ea^ paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^V3.0135^ea^ jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti; vatthu.m...pe0... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m, kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena appa.tighacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m ^a^M3.0112^ea^ vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... appa.tighaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m ^a^T3.0131^ea^ garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; vatthu.m...pe0... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m, kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appa.tighaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho ^a^V3.0136^ea^ dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appa.tighaadhipati sappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa ca appa.tighassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- appa.tighaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m sappa.tighaana~nca appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 71^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa appa.tighaa khandhaa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo.
[03] 72^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho ^a^M3.0113^ea^ dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0....
[03] 73^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... cha... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho ^a^T3.0132^ea^ dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- utu.m, senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; utu, senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^V3.0137^ea^, ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... kaayika.m sukha.m, kaayika.m dukkha.m, bhojana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... bhojana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu.m...pe0... itthindriya.m, purisindriya.m ^a^T3.0133^ea^, jiivitindriya.m, aapodhaatu.m, kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m aniccato ^a^M3.0114^ea^...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu appa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] sappa.tigho ca appa.tigho ca dhammaa appa.tighassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m^eb^. cakkhaayatana~nca vatthu ca...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca vatthu ca appa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa appa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa appa.tighassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) pacchaajaataa appa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sappa.tighassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) pacchaajaataa appa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa ^a^V3.0138^ea^ sappa.tighassa ca appa.tighassa ca kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo (dvinnampi muulaa kaatabbaa). (3)
[03] 77^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa appa.tighaa khandhaa...pe0... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^T3.0134^ea^ appa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa cetanaa sappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa cetanaa sappa.tighaana.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] appa.tigho ^a^M3.0115^ea^ dhammo sappa.tighassa ca appa.tighassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m sappa.tighaana~nca appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m sappa.tighaana~nca appa.tighaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho ^a^V3.0139^ea^ dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako appa.tigho...pe0... tii.ni.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- appa.tighaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa appa.tighassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo (avasesaa dvepi pa~nhaa kaatabbaa, pa.tisandhi kaba.liikaaro aahaaro dviisupi kaatabbo agge). (3)
[03] 81^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (tiisupi jiivitindriya.m agge kaatabba.m) ^a^T3.0135^ea^. (3)

[03] sappa.tigho ca appa.tigho ca dhammaa appa.tighassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayindriya~nca kaayavi~n~naa.na~nca kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho ^a^M3.0116^ea^ ^a^V3.0140^ea^ dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo appa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa khandhaa appa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu appa.tighaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa appa.tighassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa khandhaa sappa.tighaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sappa.tighassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] appa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa ca appa.tighassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa khandhaa sappa.tighaana~nca appa.tighaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^T3.0136^ea^ ...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- appa.tighaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa sappa.tighassa ca appa.tighassa ca kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 83^b^.^eb^ sappa.tigho dhammo sappa.tighassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo... eka.m (pa.ticcasadisaa pa.thamapa~nhaa). (1)

[03] hetuyaa eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m. (eva.m paccaniiyaadiini ga.nanaapi sampayuttavaarepi sabbe kaatabbaa. ekoyeva pa~nho).
[03] 111^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^V3.0155^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aruupii hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aruupii hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (2)

[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa ca aruupissa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aruupii hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m ^a^T3.0148^ea^ hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m... itthindriya.m... purisindriya.m... jiivitindriya.m... aapodhaatu.m... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ruupino khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0156^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 113^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^M3.0128^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... aruupino khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, cetopariya~naa.nena aruupicittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m...pe0... nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... aruupino khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ ruupii ^a^T3.0149^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m) nibbaana.m maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; aruupino khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti...pe0... raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aruupii adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aruupii adhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aruupii ^a^V3.0157^ea^ dhammo ruupissa ca aruupissa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- aruupii adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 115^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^M3.0129^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aruupino khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aruupiina.m khandhaana.m...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo, samanantarapaccayena paccayo.
[03] (sahajaatapaccaye satta, iha gha.tanaa natthi. a~n~nama~n~napaccaye cha, nissayapaccaye satta pa~nhaa, iha gha.tanaa natthi).

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ ruupii ^a^T3.0150^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati, utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, siila.m...pe0... kaayika.m dukkha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati, saddhaa...pe0... kaayika.m dukkha.m... saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 117^b^.^eb^ ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m aniccato ^a^V3.0158^ea^ ...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 118^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^M3.0130^ea^ dhammo ruupissa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa aruupino khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 119^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^T3.0151^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aruupino khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aruupiina.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 120^b^.^eb^ aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aruupii cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- aruupii cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aruupii cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- aruupii cetanaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa ca aruupissa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aruupii cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena ^a^V3.0159^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- aruupii cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 121^b^.^eb^ aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] ruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 122^b^.^eb^ ruupii ^a^M3.0131^ea^ dhammo ruupissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- ruupajiivitindriya.m ^a^T3.0152^ea^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya.m...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] ruupii ca aruupii ca dhammaa aruupissa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayindriya~nca...pe0....
[03] 123^b^.^eb^ aruupii ^a^V3.0160^ea^ dhammo aruupissa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne aruupino khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; aruupino khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 125^b^.^eb^ ruupii ^a^T3.0153^ea^ ^a^M3.0132^ea^ dhammo ruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa), ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaba.liikaara.m aahaara.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0161^ea^ ...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu aruupiina.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 126^b^.^eb^ aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- aruupii eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa ca aruupissa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- aruupii eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 127^b^.^eb^ ruupii ca aruupii ca dhammaa ruupissa dhammassa ^a^T3.0154^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aruupii khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aruupino khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ruupii ^a^M3.0133^ea^ ca aruupii ca dhammaa aruupissa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato...pe0... aruupii eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne aruupii eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... (2)
[03] natthipaccayena ^a^V3.0162^ea^ paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 128^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate eka.m aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare cattaari, indriye cha, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa eka.m ^a^T3.0155^ea^, vigate eka.m, avigate satta.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 129^b^.^eb^ ruupii dhammo ruupissa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] ruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aruupii dhammo aruupissa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] aruupii ^a^M3.0134^ea^ ^a^V3.0163^ea^ dhammo ruupissa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] aruupii dhammo ruupissa ca aruupissa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] ruupii ca aruupii ca dhammaa ruupissa dhammassa sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (1)
[03] ruupii ca aruupii ca dhammaa aruupissa dhammassa sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. (2)

[03] 130^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta, naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajaate cha, naa~n~nama~n~ne cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate satta ^a^T3.0156^ea^ ...pe0... namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pa~nca, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattaari.
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 131^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare ^a^V3.0164^ea^ tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni (sabbattha tii.ni), nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 132^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0135^ea^ aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari (anulomamaatikaa kaatabbaa), avigate satta.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] ruupiiduka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 133^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m ^a^V3.0165^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokiya.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^T3.0157^ea^ ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] 134^b^.^eb^ lokuttara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttare khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)

[03] lokuttara.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- lokuttara.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)
[03] lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] 135^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0136^ea^ ^a^V3.0166^ea^ pa~nca, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye pa~nca, upanissaye dve, purejaate dve, aasevane dve, kamme pa~nca, vipaake pa~nca, aahaare pa~nca, indriye pa~nca, jhaane pa~nca, magge pa~nca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate pa~nca.
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 136^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m lokiya.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ^a^T3.0158^ea^ ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 137^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0167^ea^ eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa dve, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate pa~nca, naaasevane pa~nca (naaasevanamuulake lokuttare suddhake vipaakoti niyaametabba.m, avasesaa pakatikaayeva), nakamme dve, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 138^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0137^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa dve (naanantarapadaadii paccaniiyasadisaa)...pe0... navipaake pa~nca, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 139^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0168^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] (sahajaatavaaro pa.ticcavaarasadiso).

[03] 140^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m ^a^T3.0159^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokiya.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, ka.tattaaruupa.m, upaadaaruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa lokiyaa khandhaa. (1)
[03] lokiya.m dhamma.m paccayaa lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa lokuttaraa khandhaa. (2)

[03] lokiya.m ^a^M3.0138^ea^ ^a^V3.0169^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa lokuttaraa khandhaa, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (3)
[03] 141^b^.^eb^ lokuttara.m dhamma.m paccayaa lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni.
[03] lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
[03] lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca dhamma.m paccayaa lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (2)

[03] lokiya~nca lokuttara~nca dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo ca lokuttaro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- lokuttara.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... lokuttare khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (3)

[03] 142^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne cattaari, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare ^a^T3.0160^ea^ cattaari, samanantare cattaari, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cattaari, nissaye nava, upanissaye cattaari, purejaate cattaari, aasevane cattaari, kamme nava, vipaake nava...pe0... magge nava, sampayutte cattaari, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa cattaari, vigate cattaari, avigate nava.
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 143^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m ^a^M3.0139^ea^ ^a^V3.0170^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa lokiyo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m lokiya.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa lokiyaa khandhaa, vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 144^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa cattaari, naanantare tii.ni...pe0... naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava (lokuttare aruupe vipaakanti niyaametabba.m), nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[06] paccaniiya.m.

[03] 145^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^T3.0161^ea^ ^a^V3.0171^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa cattaari, naanantare tii.ni (nasamanantarapadaadii paccaniiyasadisaa), navipaake nava, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[06] anulomapaccaniiya.m.
[03] 146^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0140^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m.
[06] paccaniiyaanuloma.m.
[06] (nissayavaaro paccayavaarasadiso).

[03] 147^b^.^eb^ lokiya.m ^a^V3.0172^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho lokiyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokiya.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttara.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho lokuttaro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- lokuttara.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)
[03] (sa.msa.t.thavaaro eva.m vitthaaretabbo, saha ga.nanaahi dve pa~nhaa).
[06] (sampayuttavaaro sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso).

[03] 148^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- lokiyaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0141^ea^ ^a^V3.0173^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 149^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0162^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa gotrabhu.m paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m paccavekkhanti, pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m lokiye khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena lokiyacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, lokiyaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 150^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- nibbaana.m maggassa, phalassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa cetopariya~naa.nena lokuttaracittasama"ngissa citta.m jaananti, lokuttaraa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa ^a^T3.0163^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 151^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m ^a^V3.0174^ea^ ...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... sekkhaa gotrabhu.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, vodaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ^a^M3.0142^ea^ lokiye khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- lokiyaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 152^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- nibbaana.m maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- lokuttaraadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- lokuttaraadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ ^a^T3.0164^ea^ -- lokuttaraadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 153^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa lokiyaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m ^a^V3.0175^ea^ maggassa... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 154^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa lokuttaraa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m lokuttaraana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M3.0143^ea^ anantarapaccayena paccayo; maggo phalassa, phala.m phalassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- phala.m vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 155^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo (pa~nca pa~nhaa, gha.tanaa natthi) a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... dve... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 156^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- lokiya.m saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... vipassana.m ^a^T3.0165^ea^ uppaadeti, abhi~n~na.m uppaadeti, samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; lokiya.m siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; lokiyaa saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m lokiyaaya saddhaaya...pe0... kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kusalaakusala.m kamma.m vipaakassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarasa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamassa maggassa parikamma.m pa.thamassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^V3.0176^ea^ paccayo...pe0... catutthassa maggassa parikamma.m catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 157^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- pa.thamo maggo dutiyassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... tatiyo maggo catutthassa maggassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0144^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- ariyaa magga.m upanissaaya anuppanna.m samaapatti.m uppaadenti, uppanna.m samaapajjanti, sa"nkhaare aniccato dukkhato anattato vipassanti, ariyaana.m maggo...pe0... .thaanaa.thaanakosallassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; phalasamaapatti kaayikassa sukhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 158^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0166^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato dukkhato anattato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu lokuttaraana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 159^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^V3.0177^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa lokiyaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa lokuttaraa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 160^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^T3.0167^ea^ ^a^M3.0145^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa lokiyaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m aasevanapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa... anuloma.m vodaanassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo -- gotrabhu maggassa... vodaana.m maggassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 161^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- lokiyaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro ^a^V3.0178^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaraa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa ca lokuttarassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaraa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 162^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako lokiyo eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m vipaakapaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] lokuttaro ^a^M3.0146^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 163^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- lokiyaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ^a^T3.0168^ea^ ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 164^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo (pa.tisandhi kaatabbaa); cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena paccayo; ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 165^b^.^eb^ lokiyo ^a^V3.0179^ea^ dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... eka.m, lokuttaro dhammo...pe0... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo, lokiye eka.m, lokuttare tii.ni.
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m, lokuttaro dhammo...pe0... eka.m.

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m ^a^M3.0147^ea^ kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo ^a^T3.0169^ea^ dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu lokuttaraana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] lokuttaro dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokuttaraa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ lokiyo dhammo lokiyassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- lokiyo eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ^a^V3.0180^ea^ ...pe0... (purejaatasadisa.m). vatthu lokiyaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- lokiyaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] lokiyo dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu lokuttaraana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] 168^b^.^eb^ lokuttaro dhammo lokuttarassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- lokuttaro eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0.... (1)
