(yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m... vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa noaasavaa khandhaa. (1)
[03] noaasava.m dhamma.m paccayaa aasavo dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (2)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M3.0159^ea^ dve, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava...pe0... nakamme tii.ni...pe0... navippayutte nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni (eva.m sabbe ga.nanaa ga.netabbaa).
[06] (nissayavaaro paccayavaarasadiso.)
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ aasava.m ^a^T3.0182^ea^ ^a^V3.0195^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho aasavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kaamaasava.m sa.msa.t.tho di.t.thaasavo avijjaasavo (cakka.m. sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), vipaake eka.m...pe0... avigate nava.
[03] nahetuyaa dve, naadhipatiyaa nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte nava.
[06] (ga.nanaapi sampayuttavaaropi sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso.)

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ aasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- kaamaasavo di.t.thaasavassa avijjaasavassa hetupaccayena paccayo; bhavaasavo avijjaasavassa hetupaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). (1)
[03] aasavo ^a^V3.0196^ea^ dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aasavaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aasavo ^a^M3.0160^ea^ dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- kaamaasavo di.t.thaasavassa avijjaasavassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0183^ea^. (3)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m aasavaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m aasavaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa noaasavassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- aasavaa ca noaasavaa ca hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 18^b^.^eb^ aasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- aasave aarabbha aasavaa uppajjanti. (1)
[03] aasavo ^a^V3.0197^ea^ dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- aasave aarabbha noaasavaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (2)
[03] aasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- aasave aarabbha aasavaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m ^a^T3.0184^ea^ gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa noaasave pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite ^a^M3.0161^ea^ kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noaasave khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena noaasavacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... noaasavaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa...pe0... ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aasavaa uppajjanti, siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noaasave khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aasavaa uppajjanti. (2)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa...pe0... (dutiyagamana.m) noaasave khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aasavaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ aasavo ^a^V3.0198^ea^ ca noaasavo ca dhammaa aasavassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- aasave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha aasavaa uppajjanti. (1)
[03] aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa noaasavassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- aasave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha noaasavaa khandhaa uppajjanti ^a^T3.0185^ea^. (2)
[03] aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- aasave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha aasavaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ aasavo ^a^M3.0162^ea^ dhammo aasavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- aasave garu.m katvaa aasavaa uppajjanti (tii.ni aaramma.nasadisaa, garukaaramma.naa kaatabbaa).

[03] noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa...pe0... phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m...pe0... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noaasave khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noaasavaa adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... noaasave khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa aasavaa ^a^T3.0186^ea^ uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noaasavaa adhipati sampayuttakaana.m aasavaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noaasavo ^a^V3.0199^ea^ dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... noaasave khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noaasavaa adhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m aasavaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa aasavassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- aasave ca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti...pe0... aasavaa uppajjanti (tii.ni, garukaaramma.naa).
[03] 22^b^.^eb^ aasavo ^a^M3.0163^ea^ dhammo aasavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aasavaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aasavaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aasavaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noaasavaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aasavaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa aasavaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aasavaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena ^a^T3.0187^ea^ paccayo -- purimaa purimaa noaasavaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noaasavaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa noaasavaa ^a^V3.0200^ea^ khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aasavaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa aasavaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa noaasavaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m aasavaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 24^b^.^eb^ aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa aasavassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ aasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nava... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava (vatthu ca dassetabba.m).

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ aasavo ^a^M3.0164^ea^ dhammo aasavassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- aasavaa aasavaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tii.ni).

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya ^a^T3.0188^ea^ daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo ^a^V3.0201^ea^, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati, saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya...pe0... paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati, saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa aasavassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo... tii.ni.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m ^a^M3.0165^ea^...pe0... vatthu.m (eva.m vitthaaretabba.m), pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa, vatthu noaasavaana.m ^a^T3.0189^ea^ khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha aasavaa uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu aasavaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati ^a^V3.0202^ea^, ta.m aarabbha aasavaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu aasavaana~nca aasavasampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 29^b^.^eb^ aasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa aasavaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa noaasavaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa noaasavassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa aasavaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 30^b^.^eb^ aasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ noaasavo ^a^T3.0190^ea^ ^a^M3.0166^ea^ dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noaasavaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- noaasavaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m aasavaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noaasavo ^a^V3.0203^ea^ dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m aasavaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... eka.m, aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m aasavaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m ^a^T3.0191^ea^ aasavaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- noaasavaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m ^a^M3.0167^ea^ indriyapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... nava... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ aasavo ^a^V3.0204^ea^ dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aasavaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aasavaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ noaasavo dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noaasavaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo, vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu noaasavaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noaasavaa khandhaa purejaatassa ^a^T3.0192^ea^ imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu aasavaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] noaasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu aasavaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ aasavo ca noaasavo ca dhammaa noaasavassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aasavaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- aasavaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ aasavo ^a^M3.0168^ea^ dhammo aasavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- kaamaasavo di.t.thaasavassa avijjaasavassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). (1)

[03] aasavo ^a^V3.0205^ea^ dhammo noaasavassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- aasavaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. pacchaajaataa -- aasavaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] aasavo dhammo aasavassa ca noaasavassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- kaamaasavo di.t.thaasavassa avijjaasavassa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena ^a^T3.0193^ea^ paccayo (cakka.m). (3)

[03] 124^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V3.0250^ea^ cattaari, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

[03] aasavo ceva aasavasampayutto ca dhammo aasavassa ceva aasavasampayuttassa ca aasavasampayuttassa ceva no ca aasavassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 126^b^.^eb^ aasavasampayutto ^a^M3.0207^ea^ ceva no ca aasavo dhammo aasavasampayuttassa ceva no ca aasavassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 1^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojana.m ^a^M3.0209^ea^ ^a^V3.0254^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sa~n~nojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kaamaraagasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca di.t.thisa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, kaamaraagasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca siilabbataparaamaasasa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, kaamaraagasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca maanasa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, kaamaraagasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, pa.tighasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca issaasa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, pa.tighasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca macchariyasa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, pa.tighasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, maanasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca bhavaraagasa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, bhavaraagasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, vicikicchaasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca avijjaasa~n~nojana.m. (1)
[03] sa~n~nojana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nosa~n~nojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sa~n~nojane pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ^a^T3.0242^ea^ ruupa.m. (2)

[03] sa~n~nojana.m ^a^V3.0255^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sa~n~nojano ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- kaamaraagasa~n~nojana.m pa.ticca di.t.thisa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m (cakka.m bandhitabba.m). (3)

[03] 2^b^.^eb^ nosa~n~nojana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nosa~n~nojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nosa~n~nojana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)

[03] nosa~n~nojana.m ^a^M3.0210^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sa~n~nojano ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- nosa~n~nojana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa sa~n~nojanaa ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 3^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojana~nca nosa~n~nojana~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca sa~n~nojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kaamaraagasa~n~nojana~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca di.t.thisa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m (cakka.m bandhitabba.m). (1)

[03] sa~n~nojana~nca nosa~n~nojana~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nosa~n~nojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nosa~n~nojana.m eka.m khandha~nca sa~n~nojane ca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0.... (2)

[03] 6^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa cattaari, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava ^a^T3.0244^ea^, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

[03] nosa~n~nojana.m dhamma.m paccayaa sa~n~nojano ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- nosa~n~nojana.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa sa~n~nojana~nca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa sa~n~nojanaa, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa sa~n~nojanaa sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa. [03] 11^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojana~nca ^a^M3.0213^ea^ nosa~n~nojana~nca dhamma.m paccayaa sa~n~nojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kaamaraagasa~n~nojana~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa di.t.thisa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m, kaamaraagasa~n~nojana~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa di.t.thisa~n~nojana.m avijjaasa~n~nojana.m (cakka.m) (1)

[03] sa~n~nojano ^a^V3.0261^ea^ dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sa~n~nojanaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] sa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa ca nosa~n~nojanassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- sa~n~nojanaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m sa~n~nojanaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nosa~n~nojano dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- nosa~n~nojanaa hetuu ^a^T3.0247^ea^ sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- sa~n~nojane aarabbha sa~n~nojanaa uppajjanti. (muula.m kaatabba.m) sa~n~nojane aarabbha nosa~n~nojanaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (muula.m kaatabba.m) sa~n~nojane aarabbha sa~n~nojanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ nosa~n~nojano dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa nosa~n~nojane pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... cakkhu.m ^a^M3.0215^ea^...pe0... vatthu.m nosa~n~nojane khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena nosa~n~nojanacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... nosa~n~nojanaa khandhaa ^a^V3.0262^ea^ iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa ^a^T3.0248^ea^, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nosa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m nosa~n~nojane khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. [03] sa~n~nojano ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aarabbhayeva kaatabbaa).
[03] 19^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sa~n~nojana.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... tii.ni (garukaaramma.naa).

[03] nosa~n~nojano dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... tii.ni (ti.n.nampi aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipatipi kaatabbaa, vibhajitabbaa tii.nipi).

[03] sa~n~nojano ^a^M3.0216^ea^ ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- sa~n~nojane ca sampayuttake ^a^T3.0249^ea^ ca khandhe garu.m katvaa...pe0... tii.ni.

[03] 20^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojano ^a^V3.0263^ea^ dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa sa~n~nojanaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sa~n~nojanaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] nosa~n~nojano dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nosa~n~nojanaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nosa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nosa~n~nojanaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m sa~n~nojanaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa sa~n~nojanaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo (eva.m dvepi kaatabbaa). (3)
[03] sa~n~nojano ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nava... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- sa~n~nojanaa sa~n~nojanaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo (eva.m tii.nipi).

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ nosa~n~nojano ^a^M3.0217^ea^ dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya ^a^V3.0264^ea^ daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti ^a^T3.0250^ea^, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m, raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] nosa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] nosa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa ca nosa~n~nojanassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m sa~n~nojanaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] sa~n~nojano ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ nosa~n~nojano dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena ^a^T3.0251^ea^ cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu nosa~n~nojanaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nosa~n~nojano ^a^M3.0218^ea^ ^a^V3.0265^ea^ dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sa~n~nojanaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nosa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa ca nosa~n~nojanassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti, abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha sa~n~nojanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu sa~n~nojanaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. [03] sa~n~nojano ca nosa~n~nojano ca dhammaa nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (vibhajitabba.m aasavasadisa.m). (2)

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T3.0254^ea^ cattaari, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate ^a^V3.0268^ea^ tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge nava, sampayutte nava, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojano dhammo sa~n~nojanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ nosa~n~nojano dhammo nosa~n~nojanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. [03] 36^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.

[03] 40^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojanasampayutta.m ^a^V3.0272^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca sa~n~nojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- sa~n~nojanasampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0225^ea^ ^a^V3.0275^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne cha, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare cha, samanantare cha, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye cha, purejaate cha, aasevane cha, kamme nava, vipaake eka.m, aahaare nava, indriye nava, jhaane nava, magge nava, sampayutte cha, vippayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa cha, vigate cha, avigate nava.

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojanasampayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca sa~n~nojanasampayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato moho. (1)

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^T3.0260^ea^ ^a^V3.0276^ea^ tii.ni, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari ^a^M3.0226^ea^, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojanasampayutto ca sa~n~nojanavippayutto ca dhammaa sa~n~nojanasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca moha~nca aarabbha sa~n~nojanasampayuttakaa khandhaa uppajjanti. [03] 72^b^.^eb^ sa~n~nojanavippayutto dhammo sa~n~nojanavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa ^a^V3.0286^ea^ maggaa...pe0... phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m...pe0... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- sa~n~nojanavippayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] nogantho ^a^V3.0324^ea^ dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu ganthaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

(2)
[03] gantho dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo... eka.m (pa.ticcasadisa.m). (3)
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ nogantho dhammo noganthassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] nogantho dhammo ganthassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noganthaa khandhaa ganthaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, domanassa.m uppajjati, vatthu ganthaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo ^a^T3.0306^ea^. (2)

[01] nogantho ^a^M3.0265^ea^ dhammo ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nogantho eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m ganthaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati ^a^V3.0325^ea^, ta.m aarabbha ganthaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti; vatthu ganthaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 36^b^.^eb^ gantho ca nogantho ca dhammaa ganthassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa abhijjhaakaayaganthassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho ca vatthu ca abhijjhaakaayaganthassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (cakka.m). (1)

[03] gantho ca nogantho ca dhammaa noganthassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nogantho eko khandho ca gantho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ganthaa ca vatthu ca noganthaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ganthaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ganthaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ganthaa ca kaba.liikaaro ^a^T3.0307^ea^ aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ganthaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] gantho ca nogantho ca dhammaa ganthassa ca noganthassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nogantho eko khandho ca siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m abhijjhaakaayaganthassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- siilabbataparaamaaso kaayagantho ca vatthu ca abhijjhaakaayaganthassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). (3)

[03] 57^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0273^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava (sabbattha nava), vipaake eka.m, aahaare nava...pe0... avigate nava.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutta.m ^a^V3.0336^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa ganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati ^a^T3.0316^ea^ nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m ganthavippayutta.m...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne (yaava asa~n~nasattaa), cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa ganthavippayuttaa khandhaa, vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 59^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni...pe0... naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 60^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava (eva.m ga.netabba.m).
[03] 61^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0274^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m.
[06] (nissayavaaro paccayavaarasadiso).

[03] 62^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutta.m ^a^V3.0337^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- ganthasampayutta.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] ganthasampayutta.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ganthavippayutto ^a^T3.0317^ea^ dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tho lobho, domanassasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tha.m pa.tigha.m. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutta.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa lobho ca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... domanassasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa pa.tigha~nca...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutta.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- ganthavippayutta.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] ganthavippayutta.m ^a^V3.0338^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- di.t.thigatavippayutta.m lobha.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa, pa.tigha.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutta~nca ganthavippayutta~nca dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ganthasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- di.t.thigatavippayutta.m lobhasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca lobha~nca ^a^M3.0275^ea^ sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... domanassasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca pa.tigha~nca sa.msa.t.thaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 64^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa cha, aaramma.ne cha, adhipatiyaa cha (sabbattha cha), vipaake eka.m, aahaare cha...pe0... avigate cha.
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutta.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ganthavippayutto dhammo uppajjati ^a^T3.0318^ea^ nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m ganthavippayutta.m...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe sa.msa.t.tho vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0339^ea^ eka.m, naadhipatiyaa cha, napurejaate cha, napacchaajaate cha, naaasevane cha, nakamme cattaari, navipaake cha, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte cha.
[03] 67^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naadhipatiyaa cha, napurejaate cha, napacchaajaate cha, naaasevane cha, nakamme cattaari, navipaake cha, navippayutte cha.
[03] 68^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0276^ea^ aaramma.ne eka.m, anantare eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m.
[06] (sampayuttavaaro sa.msa.t.thavaarasadiso).
[03] 69^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ganthasampayutto ^a^V3.0340^ea^ dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayuttaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu lobhassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagato hetu pa.tighassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayuttaa ^a^T3.0319^ea^ hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagato hetu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 70^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- ganthavippayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m ^a^M3.0277^ea^ hetupaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tigha.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tigha.m sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tigha.m sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 71^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena ^a^T3.0320^ea^ ^a^V3.0341^ea^ paccayo; domanassasahagato hetu ca pa.tigha~nca sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagato hetu ca pa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagato hetu ca lobho ca sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagato hetu ca pa.tigha~nca sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 72^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayutte khandhe aarabbha ganthasampayuttakaa khandhaa uppajjanti ^a^M3.0278^ea^. (tiisupi muulaa pucchitabbaa) ganthasampayutte khandhe aarabbha ganthavippayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti, ganthasampayutte khandhe aarabbha di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca uppajjanti, domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 73^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m ^a^T3.0321^ea^ katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa ganthavippayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobha~nca pa.tigha~nca aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati ^a^V3.0342^ea^, ta.m aarabbha ganthavippayutto raago uppajjati, vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati, dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati, cetopariya~naa.nena ganthavippayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... ganthavippayuttaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha ganthasampayutto raago uppajjati... di.t.thi uppajjati... domanassa.m uppajjati ^a^T3.0322^ea^ (sa.mkhitta.m). (2)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobha~nca pa.tigha~nca aarabbha di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ^a^M3.0279^ea^ ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobha~nca domanassasahagate khandhe ca pa.tigha~nca aarabbha ganthasampayuttakaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobha~nca domanassasahagate khandhe ca pa.tigha~nca aarabbha ganthavippayuttaa khandhaa uppajjanti, di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobha~nca domanassasahagate khandhe ca pa.tigha~nca aarabbha di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 75^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ^a^V3.0343^ea^ dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa ganthasampayuttakaa khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati ^a^T3.0323^ea^, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataadhipati lobhassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagataadhipati pa.tighassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ganthasampayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagataadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo.(3)

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto ^a^M3.0280^ea^ dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phalaa vu.t.thahitvaa phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti ^a^T3.0324^ea^, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobha~nca garu.m katvaa assaadeti ^a^V3.0344^ea^ abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa ganthavippayutto raago uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- ganthavippayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobha~nca garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa ganthasampayutto raago uppajjati... di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m ganthavippayutte khandhe ca lobha~nca garu.m katvaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobha~nca garu.m katvaa ganthasampayuttakaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (muulaa pucchitabbaa) di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagate khandhe ca lobha~nca garu.m katvaa di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho uppajjati. (muulaa pucchitabbaa) di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagate ^a^T3.0325^ea^ khandhe ca lobha~nca garu.m katvaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ^a^M3.0281^ea^ dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m ganthasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muulaa pucchitabbaa) purimaa purimaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa di.t.thigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa purimaa domanassasahagataa khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa pa.tighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; ganthasampayuttaa ^a^V3.0345^ea^ khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muulaa pucchitabbaa) purimaa purimaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa purimaa domanassasahagataa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 79^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimo purimo di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho pacchimassa pacchimassa di.t.thigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; purima.m purima.m pa.tigha.m pacchimassa pacchimassa pa.tighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa purimaa ganthavippayuttaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m ^a^T3.0326^ea^ pacchimaana.m ganthavippayuttaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimo purimo di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; purima.m purima.m pa.tigha.m pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa ganthasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimo purimo di.t.thigatavippayutto lobho pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena ^a^M3.0282^ea^ paccayo; purima.m purima.m pa.tigha.m pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa ^a^V3.0346^ea^ purimaa domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca pacchimaana.m ^a^T3.0327^ea^ pacchimaana.m domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muulaa pucchitabbaa) purimaa purimaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca pacchimassa pacchimassa di.t.thigatavippayuttassa lobhassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa purimaa domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca pacchimassa pacchimassa pa.tighassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muulaa pucchitabbaa) purimaa purimaa di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo; purimaa purimaa domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 81^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 82^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa ganthasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 83^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti... maana.m jappeti... siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m ^a^V3.0347^ea^... raaga.m... dosa.m... moha.m... maana.m... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti... paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya... raagassa... dosassa... mohassa... maanassa... patthanaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m...pe0... maana.m... patthana.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m raagassa... dosassa ^a^T3.0329^ea^... mohassa... maanassa... di.t.thiyaa... patthanaaya upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tii.ni upanissayaa); saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti; siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... dosa.m... moha.m... maana.m... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa... raago... doso... moho... maano... patthanaa...pe0... senaasana.m di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 84^b^.^eb^ ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo ^a^M3.0284^ea^...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca ganthasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 85^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha ganthavippayutto raago uppajjati, vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu ganthavippayuttaana.m khandhaana.m di.t.thigatavippayuttassa lobhassa ca pa.tighassa ca purejaatapaccayena paccayo. [03] ganthavippayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aarabbha di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca uppajjanti ^a^T3.0331^ea^. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M3.0285^ea^ lobhassa ca domanassasahagataana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutto dhammo ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- ganthasampayuttaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ^a^M3.0286^ea^ ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagataa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 89^b^.^eb^ ganthavippayutto ^a^V3.0350^ea^ dhammo ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ganthavippayuttaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- ganthavippayuttaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca vatthu ca lobhassa atthipaccayena paccayo; domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca vatthu ca pa.tighassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca domanassasahagataa khandhaa ca pa.tigha~nca ^a^T3.0336^ea^ purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- ganthasampayuttaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] ganthasampayutto ca ganthavippayutto ca dhammaa ganthasampayuttassa ca ganthavippayuttassa ca dhammassa ^a^V3.0353^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagato eko khandho ca lobho ^a^M3.0289^ea^ ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- domanassasahagato eko khandho ca pa.tigha~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- domanassasahagato eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m pa.tighassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... [03] 8^b^.^eb^ niivara.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca niivara.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe kaamacchandaniivara.na.m pa.ticca thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m, aruupe kaamacchandaniivara.na.m pa.ticca uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m, aruupe vicikicchaaniivara.na.m pa.ticca uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m, aruupe uddhaccaniivara.na.m pa.ticca avijjaaniivara.na.m. (1)

[03] niivara.na.m dhamma.m pa.ticca noniivara.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe niivara.ne pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa, niivara.ne pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (avasesaa pa~nhaa sabbe vitthaaretabbaa. aruupa.m pa.thama.m kaatabba.m, ruupa.m pacchaa yathaa labhati.)

[03] 9^b^.^eb^ niivara.na~nca ^a^M3.0301^ea^ ^a^V3.0370^ea^ noniivara.na~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca niivara.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe noniivara.ne khandhe ca kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca pa.ticca thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m (cakka.m). (1)

[03] niivara.na~nca noniivara.na~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca noniivara.no dhammo uppajjati napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe noniivara.na.m eka.m khandha~nca niivara.ne ca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0... niivara.ne ca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, niivara.ne ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)

[03] niivara.na~nca noniivara.na~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca niivara.no ca noniivara.no ^a^T3.0351^ea^ ca dhammaa uppajjanti napurejaatapaccayaa -- aruupe noniivara.na.m eka.m khandha~nca kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca pa.ticca tayo khandhaa thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m (cakka.m. sa.mkhitta.m). (3)

[03] 10^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa cattaari, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 11^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0371^ea^ aaramma.ne cattaari...pe0... magge tii.ni...pe0... avigate cattaari.
[06] (sahajaatavaaropi eva.m vitthaaretabbo).
[03] 13^b^.^eb^ niivara.na.m ^a^M3.0302^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni.

[03] noniivara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa noniivara.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noniivara.na.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... (yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa), vatthu.m paccayaa noniivara.naa khandhaa. (1)
[03] noniivara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no dhammo ^a^T3.0352^ea^ uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noniivara.ne khandhe paccayaa niivara.naa, vatthu.m paccayaa niivara.naa. (2)

[03] noniivara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no ca noniivara.no ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- noniivara.na.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa niivara.naa ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa niivara.naa, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa. (3)

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ niivara.na~nca ^a^V3.0372^ea^ noniivara.na~nca dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m (cakka.m). kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m (cakka.m). (1)

[03] niivara.na~nca noniivara.na~nca dhamma.m paccayaa noniivara.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noniivara.na.m eka.m khandha~nca niivara.na~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... niivara.na~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa, niivara.na~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, niivara.ne ca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)

[03] niivara.na~nca noniivara.na~nca dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no ca noniivara.no ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- noniivara.na.m eka.m khandha~nca kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m ^a^T3.0353^ea^ avijjaaniivara.na.m...pe0... dve khandhe ^a^M3.0303^ea^...pe0... (cakka.m). kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (cakka.m. sa.mkhitta.m). (3)
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), vipaake eka.m...pe0... avigate nava.
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 16^b^.^eb^ niivara.na.m ^a^V3.0373^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaaniivara.na.m paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m, uddhaccaniivara.na.m paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m. (1)

[03] noniivara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa noniivara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m noniivara.na.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa noniivara.naa khandhaa. (1)

[03] noniivara.na.m dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m. (2)

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ niivara.na~nca noniivara.na~nca dhamma.m paccayaa niivara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaaniivara.na~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m, uddhaccaniivara.na~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m, vicikicchaaniivara.na~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m, uddhaccaniivara.na~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa avijjaaniivara.na.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M3.0304^ea^ ^a^V3.0374^ea^ cattaari, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane ^a^T3.0354^ea^ nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte nava, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 19^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne cattaari, anantare cattaari, samanantare cattaari...pe0... magge tii.ni, avigate cattaari.

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ niivara.na.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho niivara.no dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- kaamacchandaniivara.na.m sa.msa.t.tha.m thinamiddhaniivara.na.m uddhaccaniivara.na.m avijjaaniivara.na.m (cakka.m. sabba.m niivara.na.m vitthaaretabba.m).
[03] 22^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), vipaake eka.m...pe0... avigate nava.
[06] anuloma.m.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ niivara.na.m ^a^M3.0305^ea^ ^a^V3.0375^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho niivara.no dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- vicikicchaaniivara.na.m sa.msa.t.tha.m avijjaaniivara.na.m, uddhaccaniivara.na.m sa.msa.t.tha.m avijjaaniivara.na.m (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 24^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa cattaari, naadhipatiyaa nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake nava, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, navippayutte nava.
[06] paccaniiya.m.
[06] (eva.m itare dve ga.nanaapi sampayuttavaaropi kaatabbo.)
[03] 25^b^.^eb^ niivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- niivara.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m niivara.naana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] niivara.no dhammo noniivara.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- niivara.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] niivara.no ^a^V3.0376^ea^ dhammo niivara.nassa ca noniivara.nassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- niivara.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m niivara.naana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] noniivara.no dhammo noniivara.nassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noniivara.naa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ niivara.no ^a^M3.0306^ea^ dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- niivara.ne aarabbha niivara.naa uppajjanti. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) niivara.ne aarabbha noniivara.naa khandhaa uppajjanti. (muula.m kaatabba.m) niivara.ne aarabbha niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ noniivara.no dhammo noniivara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m...pe0... phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m...pe0... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa ^a^T3.0356^ea^, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa noniivara.ne pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena noniivara.nacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... noniivara.naa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noniivara.no ^a^V3.0377^ea^ dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi ...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. (2)

[03] noniivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa ca noniivara.nassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
[03] niivara.no ^a^M3.0307^ea^ ca noniivara.no ca dhammaa niivara.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aarabbha ^a^T3.0357^ea^ kaatabbaa).
[03] 28^b^.^eb^ niivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- niivara.ne garu.m katvaa niivara.naa uppajjanti... tii.ni (aaramma.nasadisa.m). (3)

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ noniivara.no dhammo noniivara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m...pe0... phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m...pe0... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noniivara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noniivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati ^a^V3.0378^ea^. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noniivara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m niivara.naana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noniivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa ca noniivara.nassa ^a^T3.0358^ea^ ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noniivara.ne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noniivara.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m niivara.naana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] niivara.no ^a^M3.0308^ea^ ca noniivara.no ca dhammaa niivara.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati... tii.ni (aaramma.naadhipatiyeva).

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ niivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa niivara.naa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m niivara.naana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) purimaa purimaa niivara.naa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noniivara.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; niivara.naa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) purimaa purimaa niivara.naa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m niivara.naana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ noniivara.no dhammo noniivara.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa noniivara.naa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noniivara.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... nirodhaa vu.t.thahantassa nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatana.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m ^a^T3.0359^ea^) purimaa purimaa noniivara.naa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m niivara.naana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa niivara.naana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m ^a^V3.0379^ea^ pucchitabba.m) purimaa purimaa noniivara.naa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m niivara.naana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa niivara.naana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ niivara.no ca noniivara.no ca dhammaa niivara.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m niivara.naana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) purimaa purimaa niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noniivara.naana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) purimaa purimaa niivara.naa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m niivara.naana~nca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 33^b^.^eb^ niivara.no ^a^M3.0309^ea^ dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo.

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ niivara.no dhammo niivara.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- niivara.naani niivara.naana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ noniivara.no dhammo noniivara.nassa ^a^T3.0360^ea^ dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... jhaana.m uppaadeti, vipassana.m...pe0... magga.m...pe0... abhi~n~na.m...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m...pe0... maana.m... di.t.thi.m... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa ^a^V3.0380^ea^ ...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 38^b^.^eb^ noniivara.no ^a^V3.0381^ea^ dhammo noniivara.nassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noniivara.naa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- noniivara.naa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] niivara.no ca noniivara.no ca dhammaa niivara.nassa ca noniivara.nassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. sahajaato^eb^ -- noniivara.no eko khandho ca kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m thinamiddhaniivara.nassa uddhaccaniivara.nassa avijjaaniivara.nassa ^a^V3.0383^ea^ ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; dve khandhaa ca...pe0... kaamacchandaniivara.na~nca ^a^T3.0364^ea^ vatthu ca thinamiddhaniivara.nassa uddhaccaniivara.nassa avijjaaniivara.nassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). (3)
