[03] noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m paccayaa noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa), vatthu.m paccayaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa. (1)
[03] noparaamaasa.m ^a^T3.0394^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noparaamaase khandhe paccayaa paraamaaso, vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaaso. (2)

[03] noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0420^ea^ -- noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa paraamaaso ^a^M3.0340^ea^ ca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaaso, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa. (3)

[03] 11^b^.^eb^ paraamaasa~nca noparaamaasa~nca dhamma.m paccayaa noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha~nca paraamaasa~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe ca...pe0... paraamaasa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, paraamaasa~nca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, paraamaasa~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
[03] 12^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne pa~nca, adhipatiyaa pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), vipaake eka.m...pe0... avigate pa~nca.

[03] 13^b^.^eb^ noparaamaasa.m dhamma.m paccayaa noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m noparaamaasa.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m ^a^T3.0395^ea^ paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa; vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 14^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0421^ea^ eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, naanantare tii.ni...pe0... naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate pa~nca, napacchaajaate pa~nca ^a^M3.0341^ea^, naaasevane pa~nca, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 15^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca (eva.m sabbattha kaatabba.m).
[03] 16^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne eka.m...pe0... avigate eka.m.
[06] (nissayavaaro paccayavaarasadiso.)

[03] paraamaasa.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho noparaamaaso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- paraamaasa.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa (eva.m pa~nca pa~nhaa kaatabbaa aruupeyeva, sa.msa.t.thavaaropi sampayuttavaaropi eva.m kaatabbaa).

[03] 17^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso ^a^T3.0396^ea^ ^a^V3.0422^ea^ dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noparaamaasaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noparaamaasaa hetuu paraamaasassa hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- noparaamaasaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m paraamaasassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 18^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^M3.0342^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasa.m aarabbha paraamaaso uppajjati. (muula.m kaatabba.m) paraamaasa.m aarabbha noparaamaasaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (muula.m kaatabba.m) paraamaasa.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 19^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0... vicikicchaa... uddhacca.m... domanassa.m uppajjati; pubbe suci.n.naani ^a^V3.0423^ea^ ...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T3.0397^ea^ paccayo; ariyaa noparaamaase pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0... vicikicchaa... uddhacca.m... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena noparaamaasacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... noparaamaasaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa ^a^M3.0343^ea^...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
[03] 20^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe aarabbha paraamaaso uppajjati... tii.ni.
[03] 21^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0424^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasa.m garu.m katvaa paraamaaso uppajjati... tii.ni (aaramma.naadhipatiyeva kaatabbaa).

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... phala.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa...pe0... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noparaamaasaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noparaamaasaadhipati paraamaasassa adhipatipaccayena ^a^T3.0399^ea^ paccayo. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa ^a^M3.0344^ea^...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noparaamaase khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noparaamaasaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m paraamaasassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] paraamaaso ^a^V3.0425^ea^ ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- paraamaasa~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe garu.m katvaa paraamaaso... tii.ni.

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimo purimo paraamaaso pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimo purimo paraamaaso pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; paraamaaso vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimo purimo paraamaaso pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m ^a^T3.0400^ea^ pacchimaana.m noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo...pe0... anuloma.m phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimaa purimaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa paraamaasassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimaa purimaa noparaamaasaa khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; aavajjanaa paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 25^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimo purimo paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) ^a^M3.0345^ea^ purimo purimo paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimo purimo paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa paraamaasassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0426^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nissayapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca.

[03] 27^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena ^a^T3.0401^ea^ paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- paraamaaso paraamaasassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti... maana.m jappeti... siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m... raaga.m... dosa.m... moha.m... maana.m... patthana.m... kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti... paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m, saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya... kaayikassa sukhassa...pe0... maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m, raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m, kaayika.m sukha.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m paraamaasassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso ^a^M3.0346^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati, siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya di.t.thi.m ^a^T3.0402^ea^ ^a^V3.0427^ea^ ga.nhaati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m paraamaasassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 29^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- tii.ni upanissayaa paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa paraamaasassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu paraamaasassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ^a^T3.0403^ea^ ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 31^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^M3.0347^ea^ dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (pacchaajaataa kaatabbaa)... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso ^a^V3.0428^ea^ dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noparaamaasaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- noparaamaasaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) noparaamaasaa cetanaa paraamaasassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) noparaamaasaa cetanaa paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... eka.m... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni, indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasaani magga"ngaani...pe0... (eva.m pa~nca pa~nhaa kaatabbaa) sampayuttapaccayena ^a^T3.0404^ea^ paccayo... pa~nca.
[03] 34^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
[03] noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu paraamaasassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso ^a^M3.0348^ea^ ^a^V3.0429^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa noparaamaasassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] 35^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 36^b^.^eb^ noparaamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ ^a^T3.0405^ea^ -- noparaamaasaa khandhaa paraamaasassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha di.t.thi uppajjati, vatthu paraamaasassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noparaamaaso eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m paraamaasassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti, vatthu paraamaasassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 37^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0430^ea^ ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa noparaamaasassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m ^a^M3.0349^ea^, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noparaamaaso eko khandho ca paraamaaso ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; paraamaaso ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^paraamaaso ca vatthu ca^eb^ noparaamaasaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca ^a^T3.0406^ea^ khandhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaato^eb^ -- paraamaaso ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 38^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nissaye pa~nca, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake eka.m, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge pa~nca, sampayutte pa~nca, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate pa~nca.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ paraamaaso ^a^V3.0431^ea^ dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] paraamaaso dhammo noparaamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] noparaamaaso dhammo paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] paraamaaso ca noparaamaaso ca dhammaa paraamaasassa ca noparaamaasassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 42^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^M3.0351^ea^ naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni...pe0... namagge tii.ni, nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 44^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava (anulomamaatikaa ^a^T3.0408^ea^) ...pe0... avigate pa~nca.

[03] 45^b^.^eb^ paraama.t.tha.m ^a^V3.0433^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca paraama.t.tho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- paraama.t.tha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa).

[03] 49^b^.^eb^ paraamaasavippayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paraamaasavippayutto dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m paraamaasavippayutta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ^a^M3.0353^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m ^a^V3.0436^ea^ ...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (yaava asa~n~nasattaa) vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. (1)

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ paraamaasasampayutta.m ^a^T3.0410^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca paraamaasavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- paraamaasasampayutte khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] paraamaasavippayutta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca paraamaasavippayutto dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- paraamaasavippayutte khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). (1)

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate pa~nca, naaasevane pa~nca, nakamme dve, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

(yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa) vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaasavippayuttaa khandhaa. (1)
[03] paraamaasavippayutta.m dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaasasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaasasampayuttakaa khandhaa. (2)

[03] paraamaasavippayutta.m dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaasasampayutto ca paraamaasavippayutto ca dhammaa uppajjanti ^a^V3.0438^ea^ hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa paraamaasasampayuttakaa khandhaa, mahaabhuute paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (3)

[03] 55^b^.^eb^ paraamaasasampayutta~nca paraamaasavippayutta~nca dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaasasampayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- paraamaasasampayutta.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] paraamaasasampayutta~nca paraamaasavippayutta~nca dhamma.m paccayaa paraamaasavippayutto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- paraamaasasampayutte khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)

(yaava asa~n~nasattaa) cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m paccayaa kaayavi~n~naa.na.m, vatthu.m paccayaa ahetukaparaamaasavippayuttaa khandhaa; vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho.

[03] 58^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa eka.m, naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni, napurejaate cattaari, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane eka.m, namagge eka.m, nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte ^a^T3.0413^ea^ dve, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ paraamaasasampayutto ^a^M3.0357^ea^ dhammo paraamaasasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasasampayuttaa ^a^V3.0441^ea^ hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) paraamaasasampayuttaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) paraamaasasampayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ^a^T3.0414^ea^ ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] paraamaasavippayutto dhammo paraamaasavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- paraamaasavippayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] 64^b^.^eb^ paraamaasasampayutto dhammo paraamaasasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- raaga.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaasasampayutto raago uppajjati; paraamaasasampayutte khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaasasampayutto raago uppajjati. (1)

[03] paraamaasasampayutto dhammo paraamaasavippayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa paraamaasasampayutte pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, paraamaasasampayutte khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaasavippayutto raago...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; cetopariya~naa.nena paraamaasasampayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, paraamaasasampayuttaa khandhaa cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 65^b^.^eb^ paraamaasavippayutto dhammo paraamaasavippayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaasavippayutto raago...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati ^a^T3.0415^ea^; pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa ^a^V3.0442^ea^ vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m...pe0... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; ariyaa paraamaasavippayutte pahiine kilese...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m paraamaasavippayutte khandhe ^a^M3.0358^ea^ aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha paraamaasavippayutto raago...pe0... vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena paraamaasavippayuttacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... paraamaasavippayuttaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paraamaasavippayutto dhammo paraamaasasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m paraamaasavippayutte khandhe assaadeti abhinandati. ta.m aarabbha paraamaasasampayutto raago uppajjati. (2)

[03] 66^b^.^eb^ paraamaasasampayutto dhammo paraamaasasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena ^a^T3.0416^ea^ paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- raaga.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa paraamaasasampayutto raago uppajjati, paraamaasasampayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa paraamaasasampayutto raago uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- paraamaasasampayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] paraamaasasampayutto dhammo paraamaasavippayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- paraamaasasampayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti ^a^V3.0443^ea^ abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa paraamaasavippayutto raago uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- paraamaasasampayuttaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] paraamaasasampayutto dhammo paraamaasasampayuttassa ca paraamaasavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- paraamaasasampayuttaadhipati ^a^M3.0359^ea^ sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m...pe0... phala.m garu.m...pe0... saaramma.ne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati ^a^V3.0467^ea^. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- saaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. [03] saaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- saaramma.naadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa ca anaaramma.nassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- saaramma.naadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 31^b^.^eb^ anaaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa ^a^T4.0012^ea^, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no ^a^M3.0379^ea^ dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa saaramma.naa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo... samanantarapaccayena paccayo... eka.m... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... satta (pa.ticcavaare sahajaatasadisaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... cha (pa.ticcavaare a~n~nama~n~nasadisa.m)... nissayapaccayena paccayo... satta (paccayavaare nissayasadiso).

[03] 33^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati. siila.m...pe0... pa~n~na.m, raaga.m...pe0... patthana.m, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m ^a^V3.0468^ea^ uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. saddhaa...pe0... pa~n~naa, raago...pe0... patthanaa, kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m saddhaaya...pe0... pa~n~naaya, raagassa...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anaaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- utu.m, bhojana.m ^a^T4.0013^ea^, senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... samaapatti.m uppaadeti, paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati. utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya, kaayikassa sukhassa, kaayikassa dukkhassa, maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 34^b^.^eb^ anaaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati ^a^M3.0380^ea^, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu saaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 35^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.
[03] saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa ^a^V3.0469^ea^. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] saaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa ^a^T4.0014^ea^, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa cetanaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa ca anaaramma.nassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 37^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] saaramma.no ^a^M3.0381^ea^ dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] anaaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 38^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] anaaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- ruupajiivitindriya.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anaaramma.no ^a^V3.0470^ea^ dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

(1)
[03] 39^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni, maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni, sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.
[03] 40^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] anaaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu saaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m ^a^M3.0382^ea^ vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. purejaata.m cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu saaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] 41^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- saaramma.no eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)
[03] saaramma.no ^a^V3.0471^ea^ dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (2)
[03] saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa ca anaaramma.nassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcasadisa.m). (3)

[03] 42^b^.^eb^ anaaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... (yaava ^a^T4.0016^ea^ asa~n~nasattaa). (1)

[03] anaaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu saaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu saaramma.naana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 43^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no ca anaaramma.no ca dhammaa saaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. sahajaato^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca kaayaayatana~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... saaramma.no eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[01] saaramma.no ^a^M3.0383^ea^ ca anaaramma.no ca dhammaa anaaramma.nassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- saaramma.naa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ ^a^V3.0472^ea^ -- saaramma.naa ^a^T4.0017^ea^ khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 44^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare cattaari, indriye cha, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate satta.
[03] 45^b^.^eb^ saaramma.no dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] saaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 46^b^.^eb^ anaaramma.no dhammo anaaramma.nassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] anaaramma.no ^a^M3.0384^ea^ ^a^V3.0473^ea^ dhammo saaramma.nassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[01] saaramma.no ca anaaramma.no ca dhammaa anaaramma.nassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (2)

[03] 47^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa satta, naaaramma.ne satta...pe0... nasamanantare satta, nasahajaate cha, na a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate satta, napacchaajaate satta...pe0... namagge satta, nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pa~nca, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattaari.

[03] 48^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa...pe0... nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni...pe0... namagge tii.ni, nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 49^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m (anulomamaatikaa kaatabbaa)...pe0... avigate satta.
[06] saaramma.naduka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 50^b^.^eb^ citta.m ^a^T4.0019^ea^ ^a^M3.0385^ea^ ^a^V3.0484^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- citta.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m. (1)

[03] nocitta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nocitto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nocitta.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca...pe0.... [03] nocitta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca citto dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- nocitte khandhe pa.ticca citta.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne nocitte khandhe pa.ticca citta.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca citta.m. (2)

[03] 51^b^.^eb^ citta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nocitto dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- citta.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] nocitta.m dhamma.m pa.ticca citto dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- nocitte khandhe pa.ticca citta.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne nocitte khandhe pa.ticca citta.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca citta.m. (2)

[03] 74^b^.^eb^ nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m ^a^T4.0033^ea^ katvaa paccavekkhanti. phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m nocitte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- nocittaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo (dvepi gamanaa pa.thamagamanasadisa.m ninnaanaakara.na.m. aaramma.naadhipati sahajaataadhipati kaatabbaa). (2)
[03] citto ca nocitto ca dhammaa cittassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... aaramma.naadhipati (tii.nipi garukaaramma.naa kaatabbaa, aaramma.naadhipatiyeva).
[03] 75^b^.^eb^ citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purima.m purima.m citta.m pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purima.m purima.m citta.m pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nocittaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; citta.m vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] citto ^a^M3.0397^ea^ ^a^V3.0489^ea^ dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purima.m purima.m citta.m pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 76^b^.^eb^ nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa nocittaa khandhaa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo (ime ^a^T4.0034^ea^ dve puuretukaamena kaatabbaa, purimagamanasadisa.m).

[03] citto ca nocitto ca dhammaa cittassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purima.m purima.m citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) purima.m purima.m citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m nocittaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo -- citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) purima.m purima.m citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcavaarasadisaa)... nissayapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca (paccayavaarasadisaa).

[03] 77^b^.^eb^ citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- citta.m cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti ^a^V3.0490^ea^...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa ^a^T4.0035^ea^ upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo (ime dvepi puuretukaamena sabbattha kaatabbaa, pa.thamagamanasadisa.m ninnaanaakara.na.m).

[03] citto ^a^M3.0398^ea^ ca nocitto ca dhammaa cittassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 78^b^.^eb^ nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu nocittaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ^a^T4.0036^ea^ ...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu cittassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m ^a^V3.0491^ea^ uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m...pe0... vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 79^b^.^eb^ citto ^a^M3.0399^ea^ dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
[03] nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] citto dhammo cittassa dhammassa aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 80^b^.^eb^ nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nocittaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nocittaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ^a^T4.0037^ea^ ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nocittaa cetanaa cittassa kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nocittaa cetanaa vipaakassa cittassa kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa ^a^V3.0492^ea^. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nocittaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- nocittaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 81^b^.^eb^ citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca... indriyapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca. nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca.
[03] 82^b^.^eb^ citto ^a^M3.0400^ea^ dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nocittaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena ^a^T4.0038^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne nocittaa khandhaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m...pe0... nocittaa khandhaa vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... vatthu nocittaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- nocittaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu cittassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nocitto ^a^V3.0493^ea^ dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m...pe0... vatthu cittassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] citto ca nocitto ca dhammaa nocittassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
[03] 83^b^.^eb^ citto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
[03] nocitto dhammo nocittassa dhammassa ^a^T4.0039^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] nocitto ^a^M3.0401^ea^ dhammo cittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- nocittaa khandhaa cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... (purejaatasadisa.m, sa.mkhitta.m). (2)

[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nocitto eko khandho dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne nocitto eko khandho...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m...pe0... (purejaatasadisa.m, sa.mkhitta.m). (3)

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ citto ^a^V3.0494^ea^ ca nocitto ca dhammaa nocittassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- nocitto eko khandho ca citta~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta~nca vatthu~nca nocittaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.tisandhikkha.nepi dve). ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta~nca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.tisandhikkha.nepi dve). ^b^pacchaajaata.m^eb^ -- citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaata.m^eb^ -- citta~nca sampayuttakaa ^a^T4.0040^ea^ ca khandhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaata.m^eb^ -- citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 85^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nissaye pa~nca, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane nava ^a^M3.0402^ea^, kamme tii.ni, vipaake pa~nca, aahaare pa~nca, indriye pa~nca, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte pa~nca, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate pa~nca.

[03] nocitto dhammo cittassa ca nocittassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 90^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni...pe0... nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni (sabbattha tii.ni), namagge tii.ni, nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte tii.ni, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.

[03] 92^b^.^eb^ cetasika.m ^a^V3.0497^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cetasika.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe pa.ticca eko khandho; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] cetasika.m ^a^M3.0404^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca cetasiko ca acetasiko ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- cetasika.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa citta~nca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] 94^b^.^eb^ cetasika~nca acetasika~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca cetasiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cetasika.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne cetasika.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne cetasika.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe ca...pe0.... [03] 121^b^.^eb^ acetasiko dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... phala.m paccavekkhanti, nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m acetasike khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati assaadeti abhinandati ^a^V3.0511^ea^, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena acetasikacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... acetasikaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti (pa.thamagamanasadisa.m); cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m acetasike khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena acetasikacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... acetasikaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] 133^b^.^eb^ cetasiko ^a^M3.0420^ea^ ^a^V3.0517^ea^ dhammo acetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] acetasiko dhammo cetasikassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cetasikaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... vatthu cetasikaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (pa.tisandhikkha.ne) dvepi kaatabbaa. (1)

[03] 165^b^.^eb^ cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m cittavippayutte khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... cittavippayuttaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 166^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, cittasampayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa ^a^T4.0076^ea^ dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaadhipati cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] cittasampayutto ^a^V3.0534^ea^ dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 167^b^.^eb^ cittavippayutto ^a^M3.0433^ea^ dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ariyaa nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m cittavippayutte khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (1)

[03] 168^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa cittasampayuttaa khandhaa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo... samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... satta (pa.ticcasadisaa, pa~nhaagha.tanaa natthi)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... cha (pa.ticcasadisaa)... nissayapaccayena paccayo... satta (paccayavaarasadisaa, pa~nhaagha.tanaa natthi).

[03] 169^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo^eb^ ^a^T4.0077^ea^ ^b^...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... patthana.m kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... paa.na.m hanati...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... kaayika.m dukkha.m saddhaaya...pe0... maggassa, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya ^a^V3.0535^ea^ daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 170^b^.^eb^ cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ^a^M3.0434^ea^ ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu cittasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 171^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m) eka.m, aasevanapaccayena paccayo ^a^T4.0078^ea^... eka.m.

[03] 172^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa cetanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa cetanaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] cittasampayutto ^a^V3.0536^ea^ dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 173^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 174^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammaa cittasampayuttassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya~nca upekkhindriya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0537^ea^...pe0... kaayindriya~nca sukhindriya~nca...pe0... kaayindriya~nca dukkhindriya~nca kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.
[03] 175^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m ^a^T4.0080^ea^ ...pe0... vatthu cittasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] 176^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto ^a^M3.0436^ea^ dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo... eka.m (pa.ticcasadisa.m). (1)
[03] cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (2)
[03] cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcasadisa.m). (3)
[03] 177^b^.^eb^ cittavippayutto ^a^V3.0538^ea^ dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] cittavippayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu cittasampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... (purejaatasadisa.m). (2)

[03] 178^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammaa cittasampayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca kaayaayatana~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... cittasampayutto eko khandho ca vatthu ca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammaa cittavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena ^a^T4.0081^ea^ paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttakaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasampayuttakaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] 179^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^M3.0437^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m, sahajaate satta, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye satta, upanissaye dve, purejaate eka.m, pacchaajaate eka.m, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare cattaari, indriye cha ^a^V3.0539^ea^, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte dve, atthiyaa satta, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate satta.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 180^b^.^eb^ cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] cittasampayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] cittasampayutto dhammo cittasampayuttassa ca cittavippayuttassa ca dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 181^b^.^eb^ cittavippayutto dhammo cittavippayuttassa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] cittavippayutto dhammo ^a^T4.0082^ea^ cittasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammaa cittasampayuttassa dhammassa sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. (1)
[03] cittasampayutto ca cittavippayutto ca dhammaa cittavippayuttassa sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (2)

[03] 182^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^M3.0438^ea^ ^a^V3.0540^ea^ satta, naaaramma.ne satta, naadhipatiyaa satta, naanantare satta, nasamanantare satta, nasahajaate cha, naa~n~nama~n~ne cha, nanissaye cha, naupanissaye satta, napurejaate satta (sabbattha satta), nasampayutte cha, navippayutte pa~nca, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa satta, novigate satta, noavigate cattaari.

[03] 183^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne eka.m, naupanissaye tii.ni (sabbattha tii.ni), nasampayutte eka.m, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 184^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari (anulomamaatikaa kaatabbaa)...pe0... avigate satta.

[03] 185^b^.^eb^ cittasa.msa.t.tha.m ^a^T4.0083^ea^ ^a^V3.0541^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasa.msa.t.tho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cittasa.msa.t.tha.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] (cittasa.msa.t.thaduka.m ^a^M3.0439^ea^ yathaa cittasampayuttaduka.m eva.m kaatabba.m, ninnaanaakara.na.m.)

[03] 186^b^.^eb^ cittasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^V3.0542^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cittasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)

[03] cittasamu.t.thaana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaano ca nocittasamu.t.thaano ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- cittasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa citta~nca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa citta~nca ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 187^b^.^eb^ nocittasamu.t.thaana.m dhamma.m pa.ticca nocittasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m; citta.m pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca citta.m, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)

[03] nocittasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^V3.0543^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- citta.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa, pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa. (2)

[03] nocittasamu.t.thaana.m ^a^M3.0440^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaano ca nocittasamu.t.thaano ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu.m pa.ticca citta.m sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa. (3)

[03] 188^b^.^eb^ cittasamu.t.thaana~nca nocittasamu.t.thaana~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cittasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca ^a^T4.0085^ea^ pa.ticca dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasamu.t.thaana.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe ca...pe0.... (1)

[03] cittasamu.t.thaana~nca nocittasamu.t.thaana~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca nocittasamu.t.thaano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasamu.t.thaane khandhe ca citta~nca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasamu.t.thaane khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m, pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasamu.t.thaane khandhe ca vatthu~nca pa.ticca citta.m. (2)

(muula.m kaatabba.m) cittasamu.t.thaane khandhe ^a^T4.0096^ea^ aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. (muula.m kaatabba.m) cittasamu.t.thaane khandhe aarabbha cittasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca citta~nca uppajjanti. (3)

[03] 212^b^.^eb^ nocittasamu.t.thaano dhammo nocittasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m nocittasamu.t.thaane khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena nocittasamu.t.thaanacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... nocittasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nocittasamu.t.thaano ^a^V3.0555^ea^ dhammo cittasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti (pa.thamagamanasadisa.m); cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m nocittasamu.t.thaane khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... nocittasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa ^a^T4.0097^ea^, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] nocittasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasamu.t.thaanassa ca nocittasamu.t.thaanassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- ariyaa maggaa...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti (pa.thamagamanasadisa.m), nocittasamu.t.thaane khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... nocittasamu.t.thaanaa ^a^M3.0450^ea^ khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. [03] 213^b^.^eb^ cittasamu.t.thaano dhammo cittasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- cittasamu.t.thaane khandhe garu.m katvaa cittasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- cittasamu.t.thaanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo (tii.nipi aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipatipi kaatabbaa). [03] 214^b^.^eb^ cittasamu.t.thaano ^a^M3.0451^ea^ dhammo cittasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (vu.t.thaana.m natthi).

[03] 244^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m ^a^V3.0572^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- cittasahabhuu khandhe pa.ticca cittasahabhuu cetanaa.

[03] nocittasahabhu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- citta.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa cetanaa.
[03] cittasahabhu~nca nocittasahabhu~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati nakammapaccayaa -- cittasahabhuu khandhe ca citta~nca pa.ticca sampayuttakaa cetanaa.
[03] 245^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m dhamma.m pa.ticca cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- pa~ncavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m...pe0....

[03] 246^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane cha, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava (eva.m itare dvepi ga.nanaa kaatabbaa).
[06] (sahajaatavaaropi ^a^V3.0573^ea^ pa.ticcavaarasadiso.)
[03] 247^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m ^a^M3.0465^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni (pa.ticcasadisaa).

[03] nocittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa nocittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa citta.m, citta.m paccayaa nocittasahabhu cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (pa.ticcavaarasadisa.m, sabbe mahaabhuutaa). (1)

[03] nocittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- citta.m paccayaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasahabhu ^a^T4.0117^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (sabbe mahaabhuutaa pa.ticcasadisa.m). (2)

[03] nocittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- citta.m paccayaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, vatthu.m paccayaa citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (pa.ticcasadisa.m, sabbe mahaabhuutaa). (3)

[03] 248^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu~nca ^a^V3.0574^ea^ nocittasahabhu~nca dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa cittasahabhu cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe ca...pe0... cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (pa.ticcasadisa.m, sabbe mahaabhuutaa). (1)

[50]ittasahabhu~nca nocittasahabhu~nca dhamma.m paccayaa nocittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cittasahabhuu khandhe ca citta~nca paccayaa nocittasahabhu cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, cittasahabhuu khandhe ca vatthu~nca paccayaa citta.m. cittasahabhuu khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa nocittasahabhu cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (pa.ticcasadisa.m, sabbe mahaabhuutaa). (2)

[03] cittasahabhu~nca nocittasahabhu~nca dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa ^a^M3.0466^ea^ dve khandhaa cittasahabhu ca nocittasahabhu ca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa citta~nca, dve ^a^T4.0118^ea^ khandhe ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (pa.ticcasadisa.m, sabbe mahaabhuutaa). (3)
[03] 249^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa... tii.ni (pa.ticcasadisa.m).

[03] nocittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa nocittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa...pe0... cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0.... (ima.m cittasamu.t.thaanaduka.m paccayavaare aaramma.nasadisa.m. channampi imesa.m pa~ncavi~n~naa.namuulaa kaatabbaa. sa.mkhitta.m.)
[03] 250^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^V3.0575^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.

[03] 251^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m dhamma.m paccayaa cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0.... (sa.mkhitta.m. sabba.m kaatabba.m. paccayavaarassa pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m channampi muulaa kaatabbaa. sabbe mahaabhuute tii.niyeva moho. sa.mkhitta.m.)

[03] 252^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejaate nava ^a^M3.0467^ea^, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme cattaari, navipaake nava, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.

[03] 253^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0576^ea^ naaaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tii.ni ^a^T4.0119^ea^, navipaake nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.
[03] 254^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne nava, anantare nava (sabbattha nava), magge tii.ni...pe0... avigate nava.

[03] 255^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhu.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] cittasahabhu.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- cittasahabhu.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa citta~nca, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)
[03] 256^b^.^eb^ nocittasahabhu.m ^a^V3.0577^ea^ dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho cittasahabhuu dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- citta.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), avigate pa~nca.
