[03] nahetuyaa ^a^T4.0120^ea^ pa~nca (tii.ni, moho), naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, napurejaate pa~nca, napacchaajaate pa~nca, naaasevane pa~nca, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, najhaane pa~nca, namagge pa~nca, navippayutte pa~nca.
[06] (itare dve ga.nanaapi sampayuttavaaropi sabba.m kaatabba.m.)

[03] 257^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- cittasahabhuu hetuu ^a^V3.0578^ea^ sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (1)

[03] cittasahabhuu dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- cittasahabhuu hetuu cittassa nocittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne cittasahabhuu hetuu cittassa ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo; cittasahabhuu hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca cittasahabhuuna~nca nocittasahabhuuna~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 258^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... nava (cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisa.m, ninnaanaakara.na.m).
[03] 259^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu ^a^M3.0469^ea^ dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aaramma.naadhipatipi sahajaataadhipatipi kaatabbaa).

[03] nocittasahabhuu ^a^T4.0121^ea^ dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aaramma.naadhipatipi sahajaataadhipatipi imesampi ti.n.na.m kaatabbaa. navapi pa~nhaa cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisaa. ante tii.ni aaramma.naadhipatiyeva).

[03] 260^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... nava (cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisa.m, ninnaanaakara.na.m)... samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava (pa.ticcasadisaa) ^a^V3.0579^ea^... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava (pa.ticcasadisaa)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nava (pa.ticcasadisaa)... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava (paccayavaarasadisaa)... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... nava (cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisaa).

[03] 261^b^.^eb^ nocittasahabhuu dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m... tii.ni (nocittasahabhuu muula.myeva labbhati, cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisaa. tii.nipi ninnaanaakara.na.m).

[03] 262^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaataa cittasahabhuu khandhaa purejaatassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kaayassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] nocittasahabhuu dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo...pe0.... (1)
[03] cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa nocittasahabhussa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m)... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 263^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu ^a^T4.0122^ea^ ^a^M3.0470^ea^ dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu cetanaa vipaakaana.m cittasahabhuuna.m khandhaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] cittasahabhuu dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa ^a^V3.0580^ea^. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu cetanaa cittassa nocittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu cetanaa vipaakassa cittassa ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca cittasahabhuuna~nca nocittasahabhuuna~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] 264^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo (cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisa.m)... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... nava (cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisaa. imampi eka.m kaba.liikaaraaahaarasadisa.m). cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... nava (cittasamu.t.thaanadukasadisa.m, ninnaanaakara.na.m)... jhaanapaccayena ^a^T4.0123^ea^ paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... pa~nca.

[03] 265^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa cittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] cittasahabhuu ^a^M3.0471^ea^ dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa nocittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa purejaatassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^V3.0581^ea^. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa cittasahabhuuna~nca nocittasahabhuuna~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 266^b^.^eb^ nocittasahabhuu dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta.m nocittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; citta.m vatthussa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; vatthu cittassa vippayuttapaccayena ^a^T4.0124^ea^ paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu cittassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaata.m^eb^ -- citta.m purejaatassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] nocittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta.m cittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu cittasahabhuuna.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] nocittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- citta.m cittasahabhuuna~nca nocittasahabhuuna~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa sampayuttakaana~nca ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu cittassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] 267^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu ^a^M3.0472^ea^ ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa cittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca citta~nca cittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa nocittasahabhussa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca citta~nca nocittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ^a^V3.0582^ea^ ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^T4.0125^ea^ ...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca citta~nca purejaatassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca citta~nca cittasahabhuuna~nca nocittasahabhuuna~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] 268^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- cittasahabhuu eko khandho...pe0... (pa.ticcasadisa.m). (1)

[03] nocittasahabhuu dhammo nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)
[03] nocittasahabhuu dhammo cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m. (2)

[03] 269^b^.^eb^ cittasahabhuu ^a^M3.0473^ea^ ^a^V3.0583^ea^ ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa cittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca dvinna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... [03] cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa nocittasahabhussa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataa khandhaa cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataa...pe0... cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca citta~nca nocittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca nocittasahabhuuna.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.tisandhikkha.ne tii.nipi kaatabbaa). ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca citta~nca purejaatassa imassa nocittasahabhussa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa nocittasahabhussa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasahabhuu khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] cittasahabhuu ca nocittasahabhuu ca dhammaa cittasahabhussa ca nocittasahabhussa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- ^b^sahajaata.m, purejaata.m^eb^. sahajaato -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana.m ca...pe0... (paccayavaarasadisa.m). (3)

[03] cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaano ca dhammaa nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataa khandhaa ca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataa...pe0... cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ^a^T4.0145^ea^ ca citta~nca cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo, cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo, cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca vatthu ca cittassa atthipaccayena paccayo (pa.tisandhikkha.ne ^a^M3.0489^ea^ tii.ni kaatabbaa). ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca citta~nca purejaatassa imassa nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca citta~nca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa nocittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- cittasa.msa.t.thasamu.t.thaanaa khandhaa ca citta~nca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 309^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T4.0146^ea^ tii.ni, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, vipaake nava, aahaare nava, indriye nava, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte pa~nca, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

[03] ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca baahiro dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- baahire khandhe ca citta~nca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, citta~nca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dve kaatabbaa).

[03] ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti naaaramma.napaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe pa.ticca ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca ka.tattaaruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (3)

[03] 328^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m ^a^M3.0497^ea^ ^a^V3.0614^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca baahiro dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m pa.ticca sampayuttakaa khandhaa...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m...pe0....

[03] baahira.m dhamma.m pa.ticca baahiro dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m...pe0... baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m... asa~n~nasattaana.m...pe0.... baahira.m dhamma.m pa.ticca ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagate khandhe pa.ticca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagate khandhe pa.ticca kaayavi~n~naa.na.m ^a^T4.0156^ea^. baahira.m dhamma.m pa.ticca ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti najhaanapaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca dve khandhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca, dve khandhe...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha.m...pe0.... (3)

[03] ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca baahiro dhammo uppajjati najhaanapaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca pa.ticca dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.na.m (cakka.m).

[03] 329^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava (sabbattha nava), nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane pa~nca, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.
[03] 330^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava (sa.mkhitta.m).
[03] 331^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^V3.0615^ea^ aaramma.ne pa~nca, anantare pa~nca, samanantare pa~nca, sahajaate nava...pe0... magge tii.ni (sa.mkhitta.m).
[06] (sahajaatavaaropi pa.ticcavaarasadiso.)
[03] 332^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m ^a^M3.0498^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa... tii.ni (pa.ticcasadisaa).

[03] baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa, yaava ajjhattikaa mahaabhuutaa) vatthu.m paccayaa ^a^T4.0157^ea^ baahiraa khandhaa. baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahire khandhe paccayaa citta.m, vatthu.m paccayaa citta.m (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa). baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa dve khandhaa citta~nca cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa citta.m sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa). (3)

[03] 333^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika~nca ^a^V3.0616^ea^ baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta~nca sampayuttake ca khandhe paccayaa ajjhattika.m ka.tattaaruupa.m. ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0... citta~nca mahaabhuute ca paccayaa cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m, citta~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa baahiraa khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne tii.nipi kaatabbaa). ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahira.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca ka.tattaaruupa.m, dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 334^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m ^a^T4.0158^ea^ ...pe0.... ajjhattika.m dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhaayatana~nca ^a^M3.0499^ea^ cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataa khandhaa...pe0... kaayaayatana~nca...pe0... citta.m paccayaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ajjhattika.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0.... (3)

[03] baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m paccayaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu.m paccayaa baahiraa khandhaa. baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- baahire khandhe paccayaa citta.m, vatthu.m paccayaa citta.m (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa). baahira.m dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- vatthu.m paccayaa citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne eka.m kaatabba.m). (3)

[03] 335^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa ^a^V3.0617^ea^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagate khandhe ca cakkhaayatana~nca paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagate...pe0....

[03] ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa baahiro dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagata.m...pe0... baahira.m ^a^T4.0159^ea^ eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... citta~nca vatthu~nca paccayaa baahiraa khandhaa (pa.tisandhikkha.ne dvepi kaatabbaa). ajjhattika~nca baahira~nca dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti aaramma.napaccayaa -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagata.m eka.m khandha~nca cakkhaayatana~nca paccayaa dve khandhaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca, dve khandhe...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m). (3)

[03] 336^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa pa~nca, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate nava, aasevane nava, kamme nava (sabbattha nava), avigate nava.

[03] 337^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m ^a^M3.0500^ea^ dhamma.m paccayaa ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m paccayaa ajjhattika.m ka.tattaaruupa.m, cakkhaayatana.m paccayaa cakkhuvi~n~naa.na.m. (sa.mkhitta.m. eva.m navapi pa~nhaa kaatabbaa. pa~ncavi~n~naa.nampi pavesetvaa tii.niyeva moho.)

[03] 338^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0618^ea^ nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naa~n~nama~n~ne nava, naupanissaye nava, napurejaate nava, napacchaajaate nava, naaasevane nava, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, naaahaare eka.m, naindriye eka.m, najhaane nava, namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, navippayutte pa~nca, nonatthiyaa ^a^T4.0160^ea^ nava, novigate nava.
[06] (eva.m itare dve ga.nanaapi nissayavaaropi kaatabbo.)

[03] 339^b^.^eb^ ajjhattika.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- citta.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa; pa.tisandhikkha.ne citta.m sa.msa.t.thaa sampayuttakaa khandhaa. (1)

[03] baahira.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... baahira.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ajjhattiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahire khandhe sa.msa.t.tha.m citta.m; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... baahira.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha.m sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa citta~nca, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... (3)

[03] ajjhattika~nca ^a^M3.0501^ea^ ^a^V3.0619^ea^ baahira~nca dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- baahira.m eka.m khandha~nca citta~nca sa.msa.t.thaa dve khandhaa, dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m). hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne pa~nca, adhipatiyaa pa~nca (sabbattha pa~nca), avigate pa~nca (anuloma.m).
[03] ajjhattika.m dhamma.m sa.msa.t.tho baahiro dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa (eva.m pa~nca kaatabbaa, tii.niyeva moho).

[03] nahetuyaa ^a^T4.0169^ea^ pa~nca, naadhipatiyaa pa~nca, napurejaate pa~nca, napacchaajaate pa~nca, naaasevane pa~nca, nakamme tii.ni, navipaake pa~nca, najhaane pa~nca, namagge pa~nca, navippayutte pa~nca (paccaniiya.m).
[06] (eva.m itare dve ga.nanaapi sampayuttavaaropi kaatabbo.)

[03] 340^b^.^eb^ baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- baahiraa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahiraa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m baahiraana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] baahiro ^a^V3.0620^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- baahiraa hetuu cittassa hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahiraa hetuu cittassa ajjhattikaana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] baahiro dhammo ajjhattikassa ca baahirassa ca dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- baahiraa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne baahiraa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittassa ca ajjhattikaana~nca baahiraana~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 341^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^M3.0502^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- citta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) citta.m ^a^T4.0162^ea^ aarabbha baahiraa khandhaa uppajjanti. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) citta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; pubbe suci.n.naani paccavekkhati, jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m...pe0... phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti... nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. ariyaa baahire pahiine kilese paccavekkhanti, vikkhambhite kilese...pe0... pubbe samudaaci.n.ne kilese jaananti, ruupe...pe0... vatthu.m baahire khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena baahiracittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m aaramma.napaccayena paccayo...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... baahiraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa ^a^V3.0621^ea^, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] baahiro dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti ^a^T4.0163^ea^ abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaana.m...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m, sabba.m kaatabba.m) pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0... ruupe...pe0... vatthu.m baahire khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... baahiraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] baahiro ^a^M3.0503^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa ca baahirassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti (sa.mkhitta.m, sabba.m kaatabba.m). baahire khandhe aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa ca sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0... baahiraa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (3)
[01] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.
[03] 342^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^T4.0164^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- citta.m garu.m katvaa citta.m uppajjati. (1)

[03] ajjhattiko ^a^V3.0622^ea^ dhammo baahirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- citta.m garu.m katvaa baahiraa khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- cittaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (muula.m) ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- ajjhattika.m citta.m garu.m katvaa citta~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. aaramma.naadhipati -- daana.m datvaa...pe0... tii.ni (dve adhipatii ti.n.nampi kaatabbaa). (3)
[03] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (ti.n.nampi ekaayeva adhipati).
[03] 343^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^M3.0504^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purima.m purima.m citta.m pacchimassa pacchimassa cittassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa baahiraa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... tii.ni (ti.n.nampi ekasadisaa).

[03] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni ^a^T4.0165^ea^, samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava, sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava (pa.ticcasadisaa), a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... pa~nca (pa.ticcasadisaa), nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava, (paccayavaarasadisaa).

[03] 344^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko ^a^V3.0623^ea^ dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- citta.m cittassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] baahiro dhammo baahirassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo, (tii.nipi puuretvaa kaatabbaa, cittassaati kaatabbaa, sampayuttakaana~ncaati kaatabbaa).
[01] ajjhattiko ca baahiro ca dhammaa ajjhattikassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

[03] 345^b^.^eb^ ajjhattiko dhammo ajjhattikassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m ^a^M3.0505^ea^...pe0... kaaya.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha citta.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo ^a^T4.0166^ea^. (1)

[03] ajjhattiko dhammo baahirassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... kaaya.m aniccato...pe0... vipassati, assaadeti...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. [03] noupaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa cetanaa upaadaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- noupaadaa cetanaa upaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noupaadaa ^a^M3.0531^ea^ dhammo upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upaadaa ^a^T4.0198^ea^ ca noupaadaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- noupaadaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 402^b^.^eb^ noupaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako noupaadaa eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... tii.ni.

[03] 403^b^.^eb^ upaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa upaadaa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa noupaadaa kaayassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) kaba.liikaaro aahaaro imassa upaadaa kaayassa ca noupaadaa kaayassa ca aahaarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] noupaadaa ^a^V3.0655^ea^ dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo -- noupaadaa aahaaraa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m noupaadaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m aahaarapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... (noupaadaamuulake tii.ni, pa.tisandhikkha.ne tii.nipi kaatabbaa). (3)

[03] 404^b^.^eb^ upaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- ruupajiivitindriya.m upaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) cakkhundriya.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayindriya.m ^a^T4.0199^ea^ kaayavi~n~naa.nassa ruupajiivitindriya.m noupaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) ruupajiivitindriya.m upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] noupaadaa ^a^M3.0532^ea^ dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0....

[03] upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa noupaadaa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- cakkhundriya~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.na~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagataana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo...pe0... kaayindriya~nca...pe0....
[03] 405^b^.^eb^ no upaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni, maggapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... eka.m.

[03] 406^b^.^eb^ upaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu noupaadaa khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ ^a^V3.0656^ea^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu noupaadaa khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noupaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa noupaadaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne noupaadaa khandhaa noupaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa noupaadaa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo ^a^T4.0200^ea^. (1)

[03] noupaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa upaadaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa upaadaa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noupaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa ca noupaadaa dhammassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa upaadaa ^a^M3.0533^ea^ ca noupaadaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa upaadaa kaayassa ca noupaadaa kaayassa ca vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 407^b^.^eb^ upaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa upaadaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ upaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne vatthu noupaadaa khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ ^a^V3.0657^ea^ -- cakkhu.m aniccato...pe0... (sa.mkhitta.m. purejaatasadisa.m ninnaanaakara.na.m). ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa noupaadaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ noupaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena ^a^T4.0201^ea^ paccayo. (2)

[03] upaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa ca noupaadaa dhammassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo -- aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa upaadaa kaayassa ca noupaadaa kaayassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo; ^b^ruupajiivitindriya.m^eb^ upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 408^b^.^eb^ noupaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noupaadaa eko khandho ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m noupaadaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m ti.n.nanna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo ...pe0... dve mahaabhuutaa dvinna.m mahaabhuutaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (yaava asa~n~nasattaa). ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- pho.t.thabbe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati. pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa noupaadaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noupaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa upaadaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ^a^M3.0534^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa upaadaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noupaadaa dhammo upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noupaadaa eko khandho ^a^T4.0202^ea^ ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo; dve khandhaa...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa upaadaa kaayassa ca noupaadaa kaayassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 409^b^.^eb^ upaadaa ^a^V3.0658^ea^ ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa upaadaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa upaadaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca upaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa noupaadaa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- cakkhuvi~n~naa.nasahagato eko khandho ca cakkhaayatana~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... noupaadaa eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne noupaadaa eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca kaayaayatana~nca kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo. pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca vatthu ca noupaadaa khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa noupaadaa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa ^a^T4.0203^ea^ khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca noupaadaa ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa upaadaa dhammassa ca noupaadaa dhammassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa upaadaa kaayassa ca noupaadaa kaayassa ca atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ ^a^M3.0535^ea^ -- noupaadaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 410^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa tii.ni, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari, anantare eka.m, samanantare eka.m ^a^V3.0659^ea^, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne pa~nca, nissaye pa~nca, upanissaye dve, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane eka.m, kamme tii.ni, vipaake tii.ni, aahaare cha, indriye satta, jhaane tii.ni, magge tii.ni, sampayutte eka.m, vippayutte cattaari, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa eka.m, vigate eka.m, avigate nava.
[06] anuloma.m.
[03] 411^b^.^eb^ upaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] upaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa ca noupaadaa dhammassa ca aahaarapaccayena paccayo... indriyapaccayena ^a^T4.0204^ea^ paccayo. (3)

[03] 412^b^.^eb^ noupaadaa dhammo noupaadaa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo... purejaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] noupaadaa dhammo upaadaa dhammassa sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (2)
[03] noupaadaa ^a^M3.0536^ea^ dhammo upaadaa dhammassa ca noupaadaa dhammassa ca sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... pacchaajaatapaccayena paccayo... kammapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] upaadaa ^a^V3.0660^ea^ ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa upaadaa dhammassa pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (1)
[03] upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa noupaadaa dhammassa sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (2)
[03] upaadaa ca noupaadaa ca dhammaa upaadaa dhammassa ca noupaadaa dhammassa ca pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. (3)
[03] 413^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa nava, naaaramma.ne nava (sabbattha nava), nasampayutte nava, navippayutte cha, noatthiyaa cattaari, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava, noavigate cattaari.

[03] 414^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne tii.ni, naadhipatiyaa tii.ni, naanantare tii.ni, nasamanantare tii.ni, naa~n~nama~n~ne tii.ni, naupanissaye tii.ni ^a^T4.0205^ea^ (sabbattha tii.ni), nasampayutte tii.ni, navippayutte eka.m, nonatthiyaa tii.ni, novigate tii.ni.
[03] 415^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa cattaari...pe0... (anulomamaatikaa vitthaaretabbaa)...pe0... avigate nava.
[06] upaadaaduka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 416^b^.^eb^ upaadinna.m ^a^M3.0537^ea^ ^a^V3.0661^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne upaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] upaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anupaadinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadinne khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)

[03] upaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadinno ca anupaadinno ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- upaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] anupaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anupaadinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- anupaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m ^a^V3.0662^ea^ pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ^a^T4.0206^ea^ cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] upaadinna~nca anupaadinna~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca anupaadinno dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadinne khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)

[03] 417^b^.^eb^ upaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadinno dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- upaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa. (1)
[03] anupaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anupaadinno dhammo uppajjati aaramma.napaccayaa -- anupaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] 418^b^.^eb^ anupaadinna.m ^a^M3.0538^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca anupaadinno dhammo uppajjati adhipatipaccayaa -- anupaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m (sa.mkhitta.m).

[03] 419^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne dve, adhipatiyaa eka.m, anantare dve, samanantare dve, sahajaate pa~nca, a~n~nama~n~ne dve, nissaye pa~nca, upanissaye dve, purejaate dve, aasevane eka.m ^a^V3.0663^ea^, kamme pa~nca, vipaake pa~nca, aahaare pa~nca, indriye pa~nca, jhaane pa~nca, magge pa~nca, sampayutte dve, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa pa~nca, natthiyaa dve, vigate dve, avigate ^a^T4.0207^ea^ pa~nca.

[03] 420^b^.^eb^ upaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadinno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m upaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... ahetukapa.tisandhikkha.ne upaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa ka.tattaa ca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, vatthu.m pa.ticca khandhaa, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m, asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m pa.ticca...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)
[03] upaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca anupaadinno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuke upaadinne khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)

[03] upaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadinno ca anupaadinno ca dhammaa uppajjanti nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m upaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] 421^b^.^eb^ anupaadinna.m ^a^M3.0539^ea^ dhamma.m pa.ticca anupaadinno dhammo uppajjati nahetupaccayaa -- ahetuka.m anupaadinna.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. baahira.m... aahaarasamu.t.thaana.m... utusamu.t.thaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca upaadaaruupa.m. vicikicchaasahagate uddhaccasahagate khandhe pa.ticca vicikicchaasahagato uddhaccasahagato moho. [03] 422^b^.^eb^ upaadinna.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadinno dhammo uppajjati naaaramma.napaccayaa -- pa.tisandhikkha.ne upaadinne khandhe pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m, khandhe pa.ticca vatthu, eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. asa~n~nasattaana.m eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)

[03] anupaadinno ^a^M3.0549^ea^ dhammo anupaadinnassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m ^a^V3.0676^ea^ katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati, pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti. nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, adhipatipaccayena paccayo; anupaadinne ruupe... sadde... gandhe... rase... pho.t.thabbe anupaadinne khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati ^a^T4.0220^ea^, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- anupaadinnaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] 449^b^.^eb^ upaadinno dhammo upaadinnassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa upaadinnaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upaadinnaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. pa~ncavi~n~naa.na.m vipaakamanodhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. vipaakamanodhaatu vipaakamanovi~n~naa.nadhaatuyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] 451^b^.^eb^ upaadinno ^a^M3.0550^ea^ ^a^V3.0677^ea^ dhammo upaadinnassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- kaayika.m sukha.m kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kaayika.m dukkha.m... upaadinna.m utu... bhojana.m kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo; kaayika.m sukha.m... kaayika.m dukkha.m... utu... bhojana.m... kaayikassa sukhassa... kaayikassa dukkhassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 452^b^.^eb^ anupaadinno dhammo anupaadinnassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- ^b^aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0...^eb^. pakatuupanissayo -- saddha.m upanissaaya daana.m deti, maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... patthana.m... utu.m... bhojana.m... senaasana.m upanissaaya daana.m deti...pe0... sa"ngha.m bhindati; saddhaa...pe0... patthanaa... utu... bhojana.m... senaasana.m saddhaaya...pe0... patthanaaya maggassa ^a^T4.0222^ea^, phalasamaapattiyaa upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] 461^b^.^eb^ upaadinno dhammo upaadinnassa dhammassa indriyapaccayena paccayo -- upaadinnaa indriyaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m indriyapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadinno dhammo anupaadinnassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- upaadinnaa khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu anupaadinnaana.m khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- upaadinnaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa anupaadinnassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] anupaadinno dhammo upaadinnassa ca anupaadinnassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anupaadinnaa khandhaa purejaatassa imassa upaadinnassa ca anupaadinnassa ^a^V3.0685^ea^ ca kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo; anupaadinno ^b^kaba.liikaaro aahaaro^eb^ imassa upaadinnassa ca anupaadinnassa ca kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 465^b^.^eb^ upaadinno ca anupaadinno ca dhammaa upaadinnassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- anupaadinna.m ruupaayatana~nca cakkhaayatana~nca cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... anupaadinna.m pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca kaayaayatana~nca kaayavi~n~naa.nassa atthipaccayena paccayo; anupaadinna.m ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca vatthu ca upaadinnaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- upaadinnaa khandhaa ca anupaadinno kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa upaadinnassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- anupaadinnaa khandhaa ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadinno ca anupaadinno ca dhammaa anupaadinnassa dhammassa atthipaccayena ^a^T4.0231^ea^ paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- upaadinnaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- anupaadinno eko khandho ca vatthu ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- anupaadinna.m ruupaayatana~nca vatthu ca anupaadinnaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana~nca vatthu ca anupaadinnaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- upaadinnaa khandhaa ca anupaadinno kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa anupaadinnassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upaadinno ca anupaadinno ca dhammaa upaadinnassa ca anupaadinnassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aahaara.m^eb^ -- upaadinno ca anupaadinno ca kaba.liikaaro ^a^M3.0558^ea^ aahaaro imassa upaadinnassa ca anupaadinnassa ca kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] natthipaccayena paccayo... vigatapaccayena paccayo... avigatapaccayena paccayo.

[03] noupaadaano dhammo noupaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m paccavekkhati assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; vicikicchaa...pe0... uddhacca.m...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m paccavekkhati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa magga.m paccavekkhanti, phala.m...pe0... nibbaana.m paccavekkhanti; nibbaana.m gotrabhussa, vodaanassa, maggassa, phalassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena ^a^T4.0242^ea^ paccayo. ariyaa noupaadaane pahiine kilese ^a^M3.0567^ea^...pe0... vikkhambhite kilese paccavekkhanti, pubbe samudaaci.n.ne...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noupaadaane khandhe aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. cetopariya~naa.nena noupaadaanacittasama"ngissa citta.m jaanaati, aakaasaana~ncaayatana.m vi~n~naa.na~ncaayatanassa...pe0... aaki~nca~n~naayatana.m nevasa~n~naanaasa~n~naayatanassa...pe0... ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... noupaadaanaa khandhaa iddhividha~naa.nassa, cetopariya~naa.nassa, pubbenivaasaanussati~naa.nassa, yathaakammuupaga~naa.nassa, anaagata.msa~naa.nassa, aavajjanaaya aaramma.napaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noupaadaano dhammo upaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; pubbe suci.n.naani...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noupaadaane khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. (2)

[03] noupaadaano dhammo upaadaanassa ca noupaadaanassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa...pe0... pubbe suci.n.naani ^a^V3.0698^ea^...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noupaadaane khandhe assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)
[03] upaadaano ca noupaadaano ca dhammaa upaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... tii.ni (aarabbha kaatabbaa).

[03] 21^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ^a^T4.0243^ea^ dhammo upaadaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- upaadaane garu.m katvaa upaadaanaa uppajjanti... tii.ni (aaramma.naadhipatiyeva).

[03] 22^b^.^eb^ noupaadaano dhammo noupaadaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m datvaa siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa vu.t.thahitvaa jhaana.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhati, assaadeti abhinandati, ariyaa maggaa vu.t.thahitvaa ^a^M3.0568^ea^ magga.m garu.m katvaa paccavekkhanti...pe0... phalassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo; cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noupaadaane khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noupaadaanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] noupaadaano dhammo upaadaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m katvaa ta.m garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati; pubbe...pe0... jhaanaa...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noupaadaane khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noupaadaanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m upaadaanaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noupaadaano ^a^V3.0699^ea^ dhammo upaadaanassa ca noupaadaanassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati ^a^T4.0244^ea^, sahajaataadhipati. ^b^aaramma.naadhipati^eb^ -- daana.m...pe0... siila.m...pe0... uposathakamma.m...pe0... pubbe...pe0... jhaana.m...pe0... cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m noupaadaane khandhe garu.m katvaa assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m garu.m katvaa upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^sahajaataadhipati^eb^ -- noupaadaanaadhipati sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m upaadaanaana~nca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m adhipatipaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] upaadaano ca noupaadaano ca dhammaa upaadaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... aaramma.naadhipati... tii.ni (aarabbha kaatabbaa, aaramma.naadhipatiyeva).

[03] 23^b^.^eb^ upaadaano dhammo upaadaanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa upaadaanaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upaadaanaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimaa purimaa upaadaanaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upaadaanaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 24^b^.^eb^ noupaadaano ^a^M3.0569^ea^ dhammo noupaadaanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa noupaadaanaa khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noupaadaanaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; anuloma.m gotrabhussa...pe0... phalasamaapattiyaa anantarapaccayena paccayo. [03] 25^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ca noupaadaano ca dhammaa upaadaanassa dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upaadaanaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimaa purimaa upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m noupaadaanaana.m khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo; upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa vu.t.thaanassa anantarapaccayena paccayo. (muula.m kaatabba.m) purimaa purimaa upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upaadaanaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo. (3)
[03] samanantarapaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcasadisa.m)... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo (pa.ticcasadisa.m)... nissayapaccayena paccayo (paccayasadisa.m).

[03] 26^b^.^eb^ upaadaano dhammo upaadaanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo ^a^T4.0246^ea^ ...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- upaadaanaa upaadaanaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni.

(1)

(muula.m kaatabba.m) saddha.m upanissaaya maana.m jappeti, di.t.thi.m ga.nhaati; siila.m...pe0... senaasana.m upanissaaya adinna.m aadiyati, musaa...pe0... pisu.na.m...pe0... sampha.m...pe0... sandhi.m...pe0... nillopa.m...pe0... ekaagaarika.m...pe0... paripanthe...pe0... paradaara.m...pe0... gaamaghaata.m...pe0... nigamaghaata.m karoti; saddhaa...pe0... senaasana.m upaadaanaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo. [03] upaadaano ca noupaadaano ^a^T4.0247^ea^ ca dhammaa upaadaanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo... tii.ni.

[03] 28^b^.^eb^ noupaadaano dhammo noupaadaanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m kaayavi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... vatthu noupaadaanaana.m khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. [03] noupaadaano ^a^M3.0571^ea^ dhammo upaadaanassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha raago uppajjati, di.t.thi uppajjati. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu upaadaanaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] noupaadaano ^a^V3.0702^ea^ dhammo upaadaanassa ca noupaadaanassa ca dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m assaadeti abhinandati, ta.m aarabbha upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu upaadaanaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m purejaatapaccayena paccayo. [03] 29^b^.^eb^ upaadaano dhammo noupaadaanassa dhammassa pacchaajaatapaccayena ^a^T4.0248^ea^ paccayo (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] 30^b^.^eb^ noupaadaano dhammo noupaadaanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- noupaadaanaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- noupaadaanaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. [03] upaadaano ^a^T4.0249^ea^ dhammo upaadaanassa dhammassa maggapaccayena paccayo -- upaadaanaani magga"ngaani sampayuttakaana.m upaadaanaana.m maggapaccayena paccayo (iminaa kaara.nena nava pa~nhaa kaatabbaa)... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 32^b^.^eb^ upaadaano dhammo noupaadaanassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanaa cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaata.m^eb^ -- pacchaajaataa upaadaanaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. [03] noupaadaano dhammo upaadaanassa ca noupaadaanassa ca dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. ^b^purejaata.m^eb^ -- vatthu upaadaanaana.m sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m vippayuttapaccayena paccayo. (3)

[03] 36^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ^a^V3.0705^ea^ ca noupaadaano ca dhammaa upaadaanassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- di.t.thupaadaana~nca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa kaamupaadaanassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- di.t.thupaadaana~nca vatthu ca kaamupaadaanassa atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). [03] upaadaano ca noupaadaano ca dhammaa noupaadaanassa dhammassa ^a^T4.0251^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noupaadaano eko khandho ca upaadaanaa ca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0.... ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m ^a^M3.0574^ea^ atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanaa ca vatthu ca noupaadaanaana.m khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upaadaano ca noupaadaano ca dhammaa upaadaanassa ca noupaadaanassa ca dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m. ^b^sahajaato^eb^ -- noupaadaano eko khandho ca di.t.thupaadaana~nca ti.n.nanna.m khandhaana.m kaamupaadaanassa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo...pe0... dve khandhaa ca...pe0... (cakka.m). ^b^sahajaata.m^eb^ -- di.t.thupaadaana~nca vatthu ca kaamupaadaanassa sampayuttakaana~nca khandhaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo (cakka.m). (3)

[03] 63^b^.^eb^ upaadaanasampayutto ^a^V3.0719^ea^ dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- upaadaanasampayuttaa hetuu sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadaanasampayutto dhammo upaadaanavippayuttassa dhammassa hetupaccayena paccayo -- upaadaanasampayuttaa hetuu cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo; di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa hetuu di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhassa cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m hetupaccayena paccayo. [03] 66^b^.^eb^ upaadaanasampayutto dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- upaadaanasampayutte khandhe aarabbha upaadaanasampayuttaa ^a^T4.0265^ea^ khandhaa uppajjanti. [03] 79^b^.^eb^ upaadaanavippayutto ^a^M3.0591^ea^ dhammo upaadaanavippayuttassa dhammassa purejaatapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.napurejaata.m, vatthupurejaata.m. ^b^aaramma.napurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhu.m...pe0... vatthu.m aniccato...pe0... domanassa.m uppajjati; dibbena cakkhunaa ruupa.m passati, dibbaaya sotadhaatuyaa sadda.m su.naati. ruupaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... pho.t.thabbaayatana.m...pe0.... ^b^vatthupurejaata.m^eb^ -- cakkhaayatana.m cakkhuvi~n~naa.nassa...pe0... kaayaayatana.m...pe0... vatthu upaadaanavippayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m lobhassa ca purejaatapaccayena paccayo. [03] 82^b^.^eb^ upaadaanavippayutto dhammo upaadaanavippayuttassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaataa, naanaakkha.nikaa. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanavippayuttaa cetanaa sampayuttakaana.m khandhaana.m cittasamu.t.thaanaana~nca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo; pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0.... ^b^naanaakkha.nikaa^eb^ -- upaadaanavippayuttaa cetanaa vipaakaana.m khandhaana.m ka.tattaa ca ruupaana.m kammapaccayena paccayo. (1)
[03] upaadaanavippayutto dhammo upaadaanavippayuttassa dhammassa vipaakapaccayena paccayo -- vipaako upaadaanavippayutto eko...pe0... eka.m.

[03] 84^b^.^eb^ upaadaanasampayutto ^a^M3.0593^ea^ dhammo upaadaanavippayuttassa dhammassa vippayuttapaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, pacchaajaata.m (sa.mkhitta.m). (1)

[03] upaadaanasampayutto ca upaadaanavippayutto ca dhammaa upaadaanavippayuttassa dhammassa atthipaccayena paccayo -- sahajaata.m, purejaata.m, pacchaajaata.m, aahaara.m, indriya.m. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- upaadaanasampayuttaa khandhaa ca mahaabhuutaa ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca cittasamu.t.thaanaana.m ruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^sahajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa ^a^T4.0277^ea^ khandhaa ca vatthu ca lobhassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca purejaatassa imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca kaba.liikaaro aahaaro ca imassa kaayassa atthipaccayena paccayo. ^b^pacchaajaataa^eb^ -- di.t.thigatavippayuttalobhasahagataa khandhaa ca lobho ca ruupajiivitindriya~nca ka.tattaaruupaana.m atthipaccayena paccayo. [03] 88^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne cha, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, purejaate tii.ni, pacchaajaate tii.ni, aasevane nava ^a^T4.0278^ea^, kamme cattaari, vipaake eka.m, aahaare cattaari, indriye cattaari, jhaane cattaari, magge cattaari, sampayutte cha, vippayutte pa~nca, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

(muula.m pucchitabba.m) upaadaane aarabbha upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa khandhaa uppajjanti. (muula.m pucchitabba.m) upaadaane aarabbha upaadaanaa ca sampayuttakaa ca khandhaa uppajjanti. (3)

[03] upaadaanasampayutto ^a^M3.0602^ea^ ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo -- upaadaanasampayutte ceva no ca upaadaane khandhe aarabbha upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa khandhaa uppajjanti (tii.nipi kaatabbaa, gha.tane tii.nipi kaatabbaa).
[03] 106^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo... tii.ni. (3)

[03] upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa adhipatipaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.naadhipati, sahajaataadhipati (tii.nipi, tiisupi dvepi adhipati kaatabbaa, gha.tanaadhipatipi tii.ni).

[03] 107^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa anantarapaccayena paccayo -- purimaa purimaa upaadaanaa ceva upaadaanasampayuttaa ca khandhaa pacchimaana.m pacchimaana.m upaadaanaana.m anantarapaccayena paccayo (eva.m navapi pa~nhaa kaatabbaa, aavajjanaapi vu.t.thaanampi natthi).

[03] 108^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ^a^T4.0287^ea^ ^a^V3.0740^ea^ ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa samanantarapaccayena paccayo... nava... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... nava... a~n~nama~n~napaccayena paccayo... nava... nissayapaccayena paccayo... nava.
[03] 109^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo...pe0... tii.ni.

[03] upaadaanasampayutto ^a^M3.0603^ea^ ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa upanissayapaccayena paccayo -- aaramma.nuupanissayo, anantaruupanissayo, pakatuupanissayo...pe0.... pakatuupanissayo -- upaadaanasampayuttaa ceva no ca upaadaanaa khandhaa upaadaanasampayuttakaana~nceva no ca upaadaanaana.m khandhaana.m upanissayapaccayena paccayo (tii.ni gha.tanupanissayepi tii.ni)... aasevanapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 110^b^.^eb^ upaadaanasampayutto ceva no ca upaadaano dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa kammapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... aahaarapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... indriyapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... jhaanapaccayena paccayo... tii.ni... maggapaccayena paccayo... nava... sampayuttapaccayena paccayo... nava... atthipaccayena paccayo... nava... natthipaccayena paccayo... nava... vigatapaccayena paccayo... nava... avigatapaccayena paccayo... nava.

[03] 111^b^.^eb^ hetuyaa ^a^T4.0288^ea^ ^a^V3.0741^ea^ nava, aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava, anantare nava, samanantare nava, sahajaate nava, a~n~nama~n~ne nava, nissaye nava, upanissaye nava, aasevane nava, kamme tii.ni, aahaare tii.ni, indriye tii.ni, jhaane tii.ni, magge nava, sampayutte nava, atthiyaa nava, natthiyaa nava, vigate nava, avigate nava.

[03] 112^b^.^eb^ upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (1)

[03] upaadaano ^a^M3.0604^ea^ ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo. (2)

[03] upaadaano ceva upaadaanasampayutto ca dhammo upaadaanassa ceva upaadaanasampayuttassa ca upaadaanasampayuttassa ceva no ca upaadaanassa ca dhammassa aaramma.napaccayena paccayo... sahajaatapaccayena paccayo... upanissayapaccayena paccayo (eva.m navapi kaatabbaa, ekekassa muule tii.ni tii.ni pa~nhaa).
[03] 113^b^.^eb^ nahetuyaa ^a^V3.0742^ea^ nava, naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava (sabbattha nava), noavigate nava.

[03] 114^b^.^eb^ hetupaccayaa naaaramma.ne nava, naadhipatiyaa nava, naanantare nava, nasamanantare nava, naupanissaye nava (sabbattha nava), namagge nava, nasampayutte nava, nonatthiyaa nava, novigate nava.
[03] 115^b^.^eb^ nahetupaccayaa ^a^T4.0289^ea^ aaramma.ne nava, adhipatiyaa nava...pe0... (anulomamaatikaa kaatabbaa).
[06] upaadaanaupaadaanasampayuttaduka.m ni.t.thita.m.

[03] 116^b^.^eb^ upaadaanavippayutta.m ^a^V3.0743^ea^ upaadaaniya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaanavippayutto upaadaaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadaanavippayutta.m upaadaaniya.m eka.m ^a^M3.0605^ea^ khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0... pa.tisandhikkha.ne...pe0... eka.m mahaabhuuta.m...pe0... mahaabhuute pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m ka.tattaaruupa.m upaadaaruupa.m. (1)

[03] upaadaanavippayutta.m anupaadaaniya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaanavippayutto anupaadaaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadaanavippayutta.m anupaadaaniya.m eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (1)

[03] upaadaanavippayutta.m anupaadaaniya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaanavippayutto upaadaaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadaanavippayutte anupaadaaniye khandhe pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (2)

[03] upaadaanavippayutta.m anupaadaaniya.m dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaanavippayutto upaadaaniyo ca upaadaanavippayutto anupaadaaniyo ca dhammaa uppajjanti hetupaccayaa -- upaadaanavippayutta.m ^a^T4.0290^ea^ anupaadaaniya.m ^a^V3.0744^ea^ eka.m khandha.m pa.ticca tayo khandhaa cittasamu.t.thaana~nca ruupa.m...pe0... dve khandhe...pe0.... (3)

[03] upaadaanavippayutta.m upaadaaniya~nca upaadaanavippayutta.m anupaadaaniya~nca dhamma.m pa.ticca upaadaanavippayutto upaadaaniyo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayaa -- upaadaanavippayutte anupaadaaniye khandhe ca mahaabhuute ca pa.ticca cittasamu.t.thaana.m ruupa.m. (1)
[06] hetuyaa pa~nca, aaramma.ne dve...pe0... avigate pa~nca.
[06] (ima.m duka.m cuu.lantaraduke lokiyadukasadisa.m, ninnaanaakara.na.m.)
[06] upaadaanavippayuttaupaadaaniyaduka.m ni.t.thita.m.
[06] upaadaanagocchaka.m ni.t.thita.m.
[06] tatiyo bhaago ni.t.thito.
